What a frustrating movie . A small Southern town is overflowing with possibility for exploring the complexity of interpersonal relationship and dark underbelly hidden beneath placid surface , a anyone who ha read anything by Carson McCullers already know . This doe none of that . Instead , the writer settled for cutesy twinkle , cheap warm fuzzies and banal melodrama . The thing look like a made-for-TV movie , and wa directed with no particular distinction , but it 's hard to imagine what anyone could have done to make this material interesting . The most frustrating aspect , though , is the fact that there are a lot of extremely competent and appealing actor in this cast , all trying gamely to make the best of thing and do what they can with this -- well , there 's no other word for it -- drivel . A tragic waste of talent , in particular that of the great Stockard Channing .

This movie starred a totally forgotten star from the 1930s , Jack Pearl ( radio 's `` Baron Munchausen '' ) a well a Jimmy Durante . However , 7-1/2 decade later , it 's being billed a a Three Stooges film because they are the only one in the film who the average person would recognize today . Film fanatic will also recognize the wonderful Edna May Oliver a well a Zazu Pitts . As for the Stooges , this is a film from there very early day -- before MGM had any idea what to do with the team . At this point , they were known a `` Ted Healy and his Stooges '' a Healy wa the front man . Fortunately for the Stooges , they soon left this nasty and rather untalented man ( read up on him -- you 'll see what I mean ) and the rest is history . Within a year , they were making very successful short for Columbia and executive at MGM were soon kicking themselves for losing the team . This sort of thing wa a common occurrence at MGM , a great studio which had no idea what to do with comedy ( such a the film of Buster Keaton , Laurel and Hardy , Abbott and Costello and others ) . In fact , up until they left for Columbia , MGM put them in a wide variety of odd film role -- including acting with Clark Gable and Joan Crawford in DANCING LADY . And , oddly , in this film they did n't act a a team -- they just did various supporting role , such a Larry playing the piano ! This particular film begin with Pearl and Durante lost in the African jungle . When they are rescued and brought home , all sense of structure to the film fall apart and the film becomes almost like a variety show -- punctuated by scene with the lead here and there . As for Pearl , I could really see why he never made a successful transition to film , a he ha the personality of a slug ( but slightly le welcome ) . As for Durante , I never knew what the public saw in him -- a least a far a his film are concerned -- he wa loud and ... loud ! He apparently took time off from helping MGM to ruin Buster Keaton 's career to make this film . Together , Pearl and Durante rely on lot of verbal humor ( ? ) and Vaudeville-style routine that tend to fall rather flat . In this film , the Stooges they did n't yet have the right chemistry . Seeing Healy doing the job that Moe did in their later film is odd . What they did in the film wa pretty good , but because all the segment were short , they came on and off camera too quickly to allow them to really get into their routine . Stooges fan might be very frustrated at this , though die-hard fan may want to see this so that they can complete their life-long goal of seeing everything Stooge -- even the rotten Joe DeRita and Joe Besser film ( oh , and did they got bad after the death of Shemp and Curly ) . Overall , the film is rather dull and disappointing . However , there are a couple interesting thing to look for in the mess . At about the 13 minute mark , you will see a brief scene where a tour guide on a bus is singing . Look carefully , a this is Walter Brennan in a role you 'd certainly never expect ! Another unusual thing to look for in the film is the `` Clean a a Whistle '' song starting at about 22 minute into the film . This song and dance number is clearly an example of a so-called `` Pre-Code '' scene that never would have been allowed in film after 1934 ( when the Production Code wa strengthened ) . Despite the word `` Clean '' in the title , it 's a very titillating number with naked woman showing lot of flesh -- enough to stimulate but not enough to really show anything ! It 's quite shocking when seen today , though such excess were pretty common in the early 1930s . Finally , at the 63 minute mark , see Jimmy Durante set race relation back a few decade . See the film , you 'll see that I mean !

When Carol ( Vanessa Hidalgo ) start looking into her brother 's death , she begin to suspect something more sinister than `` natural cause '' . The closer she get to the truth , the more of a threat she becomes to her sister-in-law , Fiona ( Helga Line ) , and the rest of the local Satanists . They 'll do whatever is necessary to put a stop her nosy way . If you 're into sleazy , Satanic-themed movie , Black Candles ha a lot to offer . The movie is filled with plenty of nudity and ritualistic soft-core sex . One scene in particular involving a young woman and a goat must be seen to be believed . Unfortunately , all the sleaze in the world ca n't save Black Candles . Most of the movie is a total bore . Other than the one scene I 've already mentioned , the numerous sex scene are n't shocking and certainly are n't sexy . The acting is spotty at best . Even genre favorite Helga Line give a disappointing performance . The plot really doe n't matter . Its main function seems to be to hold the string of dull sex scene together . I 'm only familiar with one other movie directed by Jose Ramon Larraz . Compared with his Daughters of Darkness that masterfully mix eroticism and horror , Black Candles come off a amateurish . 3/10 is about the best I can do .

One of the more intelligent serial killer movie in recent history . ZODIAC KILLER offer an imaginative take on the background and history of one of the most notorious serial killer . The filmmaker create an unexpectedly good insight into the pathology of this mysterious killer , and anyone who remembers Zodiac will be intrigued . Others will want to discover more about this enigmatic criminal . Unlike many serial killer , Zodiac wa not insane at all but very methodical and a self-promoter . The director here play viewer expectation and pull it off . The film is constructed a a murder mystery , or a `` cold case '' -style thriller . It is an intelligent investigative/procedural-style horror film that will put-off gore-hounds in search of cheap thrill . Some people dislike any movie that is shot on video . This attitude is very old-style and provincial . It is an attitude and view of movie that put technical issue above entertainment value or artistic value . These attitude are on the way out . ZODIAC KILLER is a low-budget film , no doubt , but discerning viewer will look beyond that and find a carefully-crafted gem .

I 've read the other review and found some to be comparison of movie v real life ( eg what it take to get into music school ) , Britney Bashing , etc , etc . so let 's focus on the movie and the message . I have rated this movie 7 out of 10 for the age range 8 to 14 year , and for a family movie . For the average adult male .... 2 out of 10 . I like pop/rock music , i 'm 45 . I know of Britney Spears but never realised she actually sang Stronger until i read the credit and these review . I did n't recognise her poster on the wall so I wa not worried about any 'self promotion ' . I watch movie to be entertained . i do n't care about casting , lighting , producer , director , etc . What is the movie and doe it entertain me . I watched this movie for the message . The world 's greatest epidemic is low self-esteem ( which is a whole other story ) so watched with the message in mind , a that is an area of interest . The movie is light , bright and breezy , great for kid . I found the Texan twang began to fade throughout the movie and of course there are only so many way to convey the give up/do n't give up message , so yeh , it wa a bit predictable . Great message though ... should be more of them . This movie is a great family movie , but for a bloke watching by himself , get Hannibal .

I like this movie because it is a fine work of cinema , made by people who care enough to make it art and not just home movie . It is filled with Super-surfer Greg Noll 's home movie , and a boatload of amateur video from others who align themselves with his 50-year passion . Nevertheless , it ha been expanded to the degree that it approach aesthetic glory . It is filled with artistic talent , and athletic talent , however trivial you might think surfing to be athletic . Surfers are not astronaut nor test-pilots . Nor are they surgeon ( perhaps ) or Ph.d 's ( again , perhaps ) . It belief in the quest of the surfer . It belief in the beauty of human goofiness . It belief in the great gift of peace , which come from the cessation of war . Surfers celebrate the cessation of war on the north beach of an Hawaiian island attacked by Japanese zero fifteen year before . It celebrates the down-time of a country which fought a cold war-instead of a hot-war - with the Russian socialist . Surfing is the ultimate narcissism . It is dangerous , but only slightly historical . I suspect Alexander the Great would not be celebrated for his surfing technique . He had to go out and conquer a few dozen country to get the favorable press he ha received . This movie ha no military hero . It ha no gun . The only beach-head surfer conquer ha a beer-stand and and a surfboard shop . This is not a problem . Peace is not desperate . It is the joy of exhalation .

I had a hard time staying awake for the two hour opening episode . It wa dumbed down to such an extent , I doubt if I learned a single thing . The graphic were rudimentary . Any small idea wa repeated ad nauseum . Contrast this to the Cosmos series hosted by Carl Sagan . That had a good musical theme . There wa NO music coming from these infernal 10-dimensional Strings .

Although the plot of this film is a bit far-fetched , it is worth seeing just for the performance of Michaels Caine and Gambon . The latter delivers a truly wonderful Dublin accent . Caine ham it up ... which is exactly what the character he is playing should do . Entertaining and fun , this is a hour and a half of easy watching .

This movie wa so badly written , directed and acted that it beggar belief . It should be remade with a better script , director and casting service . The worst problem is the acting . You have Jennifer Beals on the one hand who is polished , professional and totally believable , and on the other hand , Ri'chard , who is woefully miscast and just jarring in this particular piece . Peter Gallagher and Jenny Levine are just awful a the slave owning ( and keeping ) couple , although both normally do fine work . The actor ( and director ) should not have attempted to do accent at all -- they are inconsistent and unbelievable . Much better to have concentrated on doing a good job in actual English . The casting is ludicrous . Why have child of an `` African '' merchant ( thus le socially desirable to the gen de couleur society ) been cast with very pale skinned actor , while the supposedly socially desirable Marcel , ha pronounced African feature , including an obviously dyed blond `` fro '' ? It 's a if the casting director can not be bothered to read the script they are casting and to chose appropriate actor from a large pool of extremely talented and physically diverse actor of color . It 's just so weird ! This could be a great movie and should be re-made , but with people who respect the material and can choose appropriate and skilled actor . There are plenty of good actor out there , and it would be fun to see how Jennifer Beals , Daniel Sunjata and Gloria Reuben would do with an appropriate cast , good script and decent direction .

When I wa a younger ( oh about 2 ) I watched Barney for the first time , and liked it . BUT , back then I did n't exactly have a brain , either . And now I look back and see what a horrible show `` Barney '' really is : First of all , EVERYTHING on that show is creepy . Barney , the main character , is a horrendous 9-foot tall talking , purple dinosaur that teach 13-year-olds about `` imagination .... '' ( * shudder * ) B.J . ( I know what your thinking about his name . ) Is a smaller yet creepier yellow dinosaur that is put in to be `` supposudly '' cool . But in fact , he is the exact opposite . After watching a few episode with B.J . dumbly trudging in with his slightly turned back cap , and making a few no-so-funny joke , I wanted to scream . Baby Bop-oh-oh-god ! ( * vomit * ) oh-oh-OH-anyway Baby Bop is the worst idea of a character EVER . She is a green triceratops ( it 's a dinosaur ) that carry a yellow blanket . Her remark of `` hee-hee-hee '' and Barney 's praise cry of 'super-deeee-doooper '' , make it hard to sit through each episode , a the Seventh grader learn about shape and manner . And that , my friend , is what make this show truly horrible .

Steve McQueen ha certainly a lot of loyal fan out there . He certainly wa a charismatic fellow , one of the most charismatic the big screen ever knew . But even McQueen ca n't save this turkey of a film , shot with what look like a brownie camera in the actual location in St. Louis . McQueen 's a new kid with no criminal record brought into the planning of a bank heist by one of the other gang . There 's more than a broad hint that there 's a gay relationship going on between young Steve and David Clarke . He 's not liked at all by the other heist member , mainly because of his lack of criminal resume . Steve also ha a girl friend in Molly McCarthy and she suspect something afoot , especially when he start hanging around with Crahan Denton and James Dukas a well a Clarke , all pretty rough character . That would certainly get my suspicion aroused . The Great St. Louis Bank Robbery had two director Charles Guggenheim and John Stix . Guggenheim did mostly documentary and Stix did n't do much of anything . One of those two joker decided Steve 's performance wa best served by doing a bad Marlon Brando imitation . This film may go down a the worst ever done by Steve McQueen . I 'm willing to bet that Dick Powell and Four Star Productions had already signed him for Wanted Dead or Alive because I ca n't believe they would have if they saw this . Or they would have seen something the public would have overlooked except for the dressing for this turkey .

This is a bad film , a it central message is very muddled and the plot seems like it wa the result of merging several disparate script . As a result , it often make absolutely no sense at all and certainly is not a film Miss Dunne or Mr. Huston should have been proud of making . However , the film IS worth watching if you are a fan of `` Pre-Code '' film because it feature an amazingly sleazy plot that strongly say that nice girl DO put out -- even if they are n't married and even if their partner IS ! ! The film begin with Miss Dunne a a social worker assisting troop heading to Europe for WWI . In the process , she meet a scalawag ( Bruce Cabot ) who eventually convinces her to sleep with him . She becomes pregnant and he then go on to the next unsuspecting woman . However , Miss Dunne doe NOT want him back , a she realizes he 's not worth it , but later her baby dy at child birth . While all these very controversial plot element are used , they are always alluded to -- almost like they wanted the adult in the audience to know but hoped that if they phrase it or film it in just the right way , kid in the audience will be clueless ( after all , film were not rated and kid might attend any film at this time ) . Surprisingly , this entire plot involving a stillborn baby and Cabot end about 1/4 of the way through the film and is never mentioned again or alluded to . It wa a if they filmed part of a movie and abandoned it -- tacking it on to still another film . In this second phase of the film , Miss Dunne unexpectedly begin working at a woman 's prison ( though we actually never really get to see her doing anything there ) . What we do see are countless horrible scene of severe abuse and torture that were probably designed to titillate . And , a a result of all this violence , Miss Dunne go on a crusade to clean up the prison and becomes a reformer and famous writer . But then , out of the blue , another type of film emerges and the woman 's prison reform business go by the wayside . Dunne meet a judge ( Walter Huston ) who is married but he desperately want her . Now throughout the film , Dunne is portrayed a a very good girl -- even though she did have unmarried sex with Cabot ( she wa more or le tricked into it ) . But now , single Irene , who is a tireless reformer and good lady begin sleeping with a married man . He tell her that he and his wife are estranged and are married in name only , but she never think to investigate if this is true , and with his assurance , off fly her clothes and they are in the baby making business ! BUT , while she 's pregnant with his love child , he 's indicted for being a crooked judge . He assures her he 's innocent , but he 's convicted and it sure sound like he 's a scoundrel -- using inside information from people that have come before his bench in order to amass a fortune . Then , in the final moment of the film , Miss Dunne try in vain to get him freed and vow to wait with the child until Huston is released . The film then end . So , we basically have three separate film AND a bizarre early 30 idea of what a nice girl should be like . I gathered that she should be a strong-minded working girl who instantly becomes an idiot in her personal relationship ! This really undoes all the positive about Dunne 's character and it 's really hard to imagine anyone liking the film . A strong woman 's right advocate might easily be offended at how weak-minded and needy she wa and religious people might see her a totally amoral or at least morally suspect ! With a decent re-write , this could have been a good film or at least interesting a a lewd and salacious film , but it could n't make up it mind WHAT it wanted to be and wa just another dull Pre-Code film .

I caught this movie on the Sci-Fi channel recently . It actually turned out to be pretty decent a far a B-list horror/suspense film go . Two guy ( one naive and one loud mouthed a * * ) take a road trip to stop a wedding but have the worst possible luck when a maniac in a freaky , make-shift tank/truck hybrid decides to play cat-and-mouse with them . Things are further complicated when they pick up a ridiculously whorish hitchhiker . What make this film unique is that the combination of comedy and terror actually work in this movie , unlike so many others . The two guy are likable enough and there are some good chase/suspense scene . Nice pacing and comic timing make this movie more than passable for the horror/slasher buff . Definitely worth checking out .

( Very mild spoiler ; a basic plot outline , no real detail ) IF you go into this movie with sufficiently low expectation . I saw this film at a free screening a few day ago in Maryland , and the only reason I agreed to go ... wa because it wa free . I expected a few chuckle , but a I have never been a huge fan of Tenacious D , not much more then that . The first ten minute of the film are hilarious , a we are given a look at Jack Black 's humble Christian origin in a Midwest American town . The film then take u year into the future , to the first meeting between JB and Kyle Gass , the second half of Tenacious D. We see the formation of the band and the genesis of it name . Finally , a the title suggests , the second half of the film detail their quest to obtain the fabled `` Pick of Destiny . '' Again , the beginning of the film wa laugh out loud funny , and most of the movie at least kept a smile on my face . That said , there were time it felt a bit long ; it 's only 100 minute , but it still felt like it should have been a bit shorter . The story is every bit a absurd a it sound , and this is not a film you see if you want a real plot . Which is fine , except it mean that many of the joke are very hit or miss ... and when they miss , they miss bad . Same thing with the song ; it is a musical , but many of the song lost their appeal after the first minute or so ... then kept going anyway . I will say that the R-rating really saved this movie from bombing ; The D 's humor simply could n't work without cussing , sex , and drug reference . But unless you 're a real fan of the band , or at the very least know you appreciate their style of comedy , I would recommend you save yourself some money and rent . `` Pick '' will make you giggle a bit ... but is it worth 9 buck ? I do n't think so . I wa tempted to rate it a 6 , but since I do think that many would enjoy it enough to justify seeing it in theatre , a 7 seems more appropriate . Just be sure it 's your style .

I shall begin with a disclaimer : This movie is NOT recommended for anyone who lack interest or have never played FF7 the game before watching . The movie relies on the audience 's knowledge of each character in the game to convey story plot element . And it doe so very subtly . Do your homework before watching this wonderful piece of CG film and I promise it 'll be that much better . With that in mind , this film ha some of the most spectacular CG sequence I have ever witnessed . The whole experience felt like an extra long FMV sequence from the game , on steroid . Yeah . The attention to detail in each scene , especially in the heavy action oriented one , is so impeccable it left me with a sense of awe . I believe the soundtrack is simplified so a to help the audience focus on the animation quality more than the music . Again , for those who are familiar with the FF7 story and background , the music should not surprise anyone ( although the timing and placement of each soundtrack from the original accompany each scene and mood to the point where the music simply enhances the animation ) . Once again , I myself having only played through FF7 once , thoroughly enjoyed this piece of art from Square Enix . And that is the feel in most scene , choreographed and organized . Like a dance . In short , if you enjoyed the music or the game Final Fantasy 7 , this film will blow you out of the water . If you 're in the unfortunate majority who ha not experienced the goodness known a FF7 on Playstation or PC , doing so before watching the movie will allow for an exponentially greater experience . Finally , I just want to make a note of the quality in animating this film . Characters move with fluidity . Each scene background come to life and tell it own story . For those who criticize the thinness and dependency of the story plot , I urge you to reexamine the animation . Facial reaction , subtle clue that bring about another level of entertainment above the typical narration method of story plot delivery . Square Enix and the great Tetsuya Nomura ha set a new bar for quality animation and storytelling . Advent Children ha ushered in a new era for CG animation , allowing the subtlety that lie in each character to speak volume in and of themselves . Thanks Square Enix . The wait wa well worth it .

This is quite possibly one of the worst movie ever made . Everything about it -- acting , directing , script , cinematography -- is dreadful . The alien ( a human in sparkly suit ) claim to be from a nearby universe ; one assumes the scriptwriter meant `` galaxy '' but did n't bother to get a dictionary to check his term . A better title for the film would be `` It Came From the Planet of Plot Contrivances . '' The plot is excessively silly and nearly nonexistent . The human are all given magical MacGuffins that conform to a tortuous series of unlikely restriction just to move the bare plot . Any thought to the passage of time is ignored . Now it 's a couple day after meeting the alien , then BAM ! all of a sudden there 's only a couple hour left until zero hour . Do yourself a favor and miss this movie . You will make yourself stupider for having watched it . The ending is particularly silly , and should have been accompanied by someone going `` Ta-Da ! ! ! ! '' a the scriptwriter just pull something random out of his butt . I think the real alien plot is that this movie suck so bad you 'll get cancer watching it . If you can watch the last 10 minute without crapping yourself ( `` enemy of freedom '' -- honestly ) laughing , you 're retarded .

If you really really REALLY enjoy movie featuring ant building dirt-mirrors , eating non-ants , and conquering the world with a voice-over narrative , then this is the movie for you . Basically , a couple of scientist working out of a bio-dome communicate with highly intelligent ant ( the most intelligent actor in this film ) in an attempt to try to thwart their plan of conquest and extermination . Throughout the movie the two scientist ( and a girl they rescued from the ant ) use everything at their disposal ( computer , green dye , and horrid acting ) , but to no avail . I guess they just could n't afford any pesticide because the movie would be over too quickly . The title of the movie `` Phase IV '' is something of a mystery . This is not a spoiler , but `` Phase I '' start right after the opening credit whereas you do n't reach `` Phase IV '' until the end credit roll . Apparently the director knew the movie would be tedious to get through and so placed Phases 1 - 3 throughout the movie a a kind of progress report : `` Hang in there buddy ! Only 1 more phase until final credit ! '' As a MST3K episode , this one wa n't very good for two reason : 1 ) This one is from the Season 0 on KTMA when they were first starting out so the riffing is not a good a in later season ; and 2 ) This movie is so bad not even J & TB can lighten it up . There are one or two Gamera reference a they had just finished riffing 5 Gamera movie . The movie doe have a trick/surprise ending , but I wa so glad to reach the end the effect wa lost on me .

Joseph Brady and Clarence Doolittle are two sailor , who have a four-day shore leave in Hollywood.Joe know everything about girl and ca n't wait to see Lola , while Clarence is shyer and need some advice from his buddy on how to meet girls.They then run into a little boy , Donald Martin , who ha ran away in order to join the navy.They take him home and meet his beautiful aunt Susan , who want to be a singer.Clarence want Susie to be his girl , but his shyness get in the way.But he doe n't feel shy with a waitress , who come from Brooklyn , like he does.Soon Joe notice he 's in love with Susie.The boy are in a fix when they lie to Susie on meeting with a big time music producer they do n't even know.As they are in a fix with their feelings.George Sidney 's Anchors Aweigh ( 1945 ) is a great musical comedy.Gene Kelly is top-notch , once again , in his singing and dancing routines.Frank Sinatra is terrific a the shy guy from Brooklyn.Shy is n't the first thing that come to mind when you think of Frank Sinatra , but he play his part well.Kathryn Grayson is fantastic a Susan Abbott.We sadly lost this gifted actress and operatic soprano singer last month at the age of 88.The 9-year old Dean Stockwell doe amazing job a the little fellow wanting to become a sailor.Jose Iturbi doe great job performing himself.It 's magic what he doe with the piano.Edgar Kennedy play Chief of police station.Sara Berner is the voice of Jerry Mouse.There 's a lot of great stuff in this movie and some fantastic singing and dancing numbers.Just look at Kelly and Sinatra performing `` We Hate to Leave '' .It 's so energetic . `` If You Knew Susie ( Like I Know Susie ) '' is quite funny.It 's a nice moment when Frank sings Brahms ' Lullaby to little Dean Stockwell.It 's lovely to listen to Grayson singing the tango `` Jealousy '' .The most memorable sequence is the one that take into the animated fantasy world , and there Gene sings and dance with Jerry Mouse.Also Tom Cat is seen there a the butler.They originally asked Mickey Mouse but he refused.The movie wa nominated for five Oscars but Georgie Stoll got one for Original Music Score.Anchors Aweigh is some high class entertainment .

From director Barbet Schroder ( Reversal of Fortune ) , I think I saw a bit of this in my Media Studies class , and I recognised the leading actress , so I tried it , despite the rating by the critic . Basically cool kid Richard Haywood ( Half Nelson 's Ryan Gosling ) and Justin Pendleton ( Bully 's Michael Pitt ) team up to murder a random girl to challenge themselves and see if they can get away with it without the police finding them . Investigating the murder is homicide detective Cassie 'The Hyena ' Mayweather ( Sandra Bullock ) with new partner Sam Kennedy ( Ben Chaplin ) , who are pretty baffled by the evidence found on the scene , e.g . non-relating hair . The plan doe n't seem to be completely going well because Cassie and Sam do quite quickly have Richard or Justin a suspect , it is just a question of if they can sway them away . Also starring Agnes Bruckner a Lisa Mills , Chris Penn a Ray Feathers , R.D . Call a Captain Rod Cody and Tom Verica a Asst . D.A . Al Swanson . I can see now the same concept a Sir Alfred Hitchcock 's Rope with the murdering for a challenge thing , but this film doe it in a very silly way , and not even a reasonably good Bullock can save it from being dull and predictable . Adequate !

Things to Come is an early Sci-Fi film that show an imagined world , or `` Everytown '' through 100 year . You can break it up into about 4 different scene or part . The film span from 1940 to 2036 and is mainly about how this ruler or the `` Boss '' wanted to get the capability to fly in airplane again , after Everytown wa bombed and war broke out . This film only ha about 3 fault : it 's audio is muddy and video had some quirk , the character are n't deep at all , and the overall plot is n't altogether solid . The plot is lacking something that I ca n't put my finger on ... it just seems a little `` fluffy . '' But if you love sci-fi and are interested in what H.G . Wells though might happened in the next hundred year , this is a must see . It 's worth seeing just to learn of what everyone wa fearing : a long , drawn-out war , because they were just about to go to war with Germany , and there wa a threat of biological weapon and everything . Things to Come is a pretty good movie that most people need to see once .

Weak , stale , tired , cliched ; want to be Basic Instinct , but miss opportunity after opportunity for fresh perspective , new insight . Insipid , trite , grotesque , and without the possibly-redeeming value of brevity ; oh , wait ... it wa only 90 minute long ... it must have just * seemed * a lot longer ! I 'd rather clean bus station toilet with my toothbrush than have to sit through this again . I 'm expressing an opinion here : I guess this mean I did n't like it .

One word can describe this movie and that is weird . I recorded this movie one day because it wa a Japanese animation and it wa old so I thought it would be interesting . Well it wa , the movie is about a young boy who travel the universe to get a metal body so he can seek revenge . On the way he meet very colorful character and must ultimately decide if he want the body or not . Very strange , if you are a fan of animation/science-fiction you might want to check this out .

While i wa the video store i wa browsing through the one dollar rental and came upon this little gem . I do n't know what it wa about it but i just had a gut instic about it and wow wa i ever right . The story center around two girl who have just survived a school shooting . One of the girl is Alicia a teenage reble who is the only witness for the full attack and another is Deanna another survivor who survived a bullet to the head by some miracle . Thrown together by fate , they slowly begin a painful and beautiful display of healing and moving on . I just hate it when amazing movie fall through the crack . Because wow what a performance by Busy Phillips and Erkia Christensen not to mention the rest of the cast ! My only complaint is that the DVD wa sorely lacking in special feature . Oh and some of the jump cut in the movie were kind of jarring . But all in all a excellent movie .

This movie is a riot . I can not remember the last time I had such a great time at the movie . I 've seen a few good comedy in my time and usually they are pretty funny . But this one is wall to wall great line . I think Best in Show is the last movie that I laughed so hard and so much in . The movie wa non-stop until the end when they did the 5 minute of sentimental plot clean up . Other than that it 's a constant barrage of one liner and goofy situation . I 'd like to see it again before it leaf the theater because this is like the Zucker movie where you do n't get all the joke the first time around . You have to see it two or three time to get it all in . As far a the actual film go , it could have used a better edit , it 's choppy at time but we have to be forgiving for that . All the character are great . It 's not like an Adam Sandler movie where he try to be funny and everyone else suffers around him and is the butt of the joke . I think I will remember all the main character for year to come because they are all so likable . No victim in this movie . Also , thank God they got a 45 year old actress to play his girlfriend . Catherine Keener play her and she is a sweetheart in this film . You just wish that woman like her really existed . She 's not a `` 10 '' like some of the other leading lady but somehow her smile is warmer than Julia Roberts overdone overbite . If you see the trailer for this film you may not think too highly of it . I assure you , the trailer doe not do it justice . They do not give away all the good joke . Just some of the mediocre one . Oh and one more thing . I hope critic put this on their top ten list . Many of them complain that comedy do n't get the recognition they deserve and then at the end of the year they do n't put it on their list . This mean you Ebert ! ! !

A fey story of a Martian attempt to colonize Earth . ( Things must be pretty bad back on Mars . ) Two state trooper investigate the scene of a reported UFO crash . Whatever landed is buried under the ice at Tracy 's Pond but there are footstep in the snow leading to a nearby diner . The diner ha had no customer since eleven o'clock that morning . Now there are a handful of bus passenger sitting around waiting for permission to cross a structurally weak bridge . The bus driver insists that six passenger were aboard the bus , although he did n't notice who they were . The problem is that there are now SEVEN people waiting for the journey to be resumed . One of them is an alien , but which one ? All of them are suspect . There 's the crazy old man ( Jack Elam ) , of course , who seems to exercise a sub rosa wit . There 's a blustering businessman who must get to Boston ( John Hoyt ) . A young couple on their honeymoon . ( Execrable performance by the husband , Ron Kipling . ) Except for the couple , nobody ha noticed anyone else . And even the couple are suspicious of each other . Bride to newly minted husband : `` I could have sworn you had a mole on your chin . '' The story continues in a sprightly but slightly spooky way -- the phone ring for no reason , the light go on and off , the juke box turn itself on -- and none of it is to be taken seriously . It 's a thoroughly enjoyable ensemble play and the climactic revelation is worth a chuckle . There is no discernible `` depth '' to it . It 's not a moral message about pod people masquerading a normal citizen . It 's not a warning of any kind , just a fairy tale that diverts and amuses . I always enjoy it when it 's on . It 's especially interesting to see John Hoyt a the irritable and impatient businessman , knowing that in 1954 he wa the Roman Senator who masterminded the assassination of Julius Caesar in MGM 's version of Shakespeare 's play . And here he is -- with three arm . Oops .

It 's rare that I feel a need to write a review on this site , but this film is very deserving because of how poorly it wa created , and how bias it product wa . I felt a distinct attempt on the part of the film-makers to display the Palestinian family a boorish and untrustworthy . We hear them discus the sadness that they feel from oppression , yet the film is shot and arranged in a way that we feel the politically oppressed population is the Jewish Israeli population . We see no evidence that parallel the position of the Palestinian teenager . We only hear from other Palestinians in prison . I understand restriction are in place , but the political nature of the restriction are designed to prevent peace . I came out of the film feeling that the mother of the victim wa selfish in her mourning and completely closed minded due to her side of the fence , so to speak . She continued to be unwilling to see the hurt of the bomber 's parent , and her angry and closed-minded word caused the final meeting to spiral out of control . It is more realistic , in my mind , to see the Israeli mindset to be a root of the problem ; ignored plea for understanding and freedom , ignored request for acknowledgment for the process by which the Jewish population acquired the land . I have given this a two because of these selfish weakness of the mother , which normally would be admirable in a documentary , however in the light of the lack of impartiality , it all seems exploitative . Also for the poor edits , lack of background in the actual instance , and finally the lack of proper representation of the Palestinian side . Ultimately , it is a poor documentary and a poor film . I acknowledge this is partially the result of the political situation , but am obliged to note the flaw in direction regardless of the heart-wrenching and sad subject matter .

Relentless like one of those loud action movie . The entire cast seems to be on speed . I did n't quite get the director 's intention if any . I wonder if she 's ever seen a Stanley Donen , Vincent Minnelli or even a George Sidney musical . Structure , please ! This is one hell of a mess and I loved Abba . The costume the unflattering photography - unflattering towards the actor but loving towards the location ) The one thing that make the whole thing bearable is the sight of Meryl Streep making a fool of herself . No chemistry with her friend ( Christine Baranski and Julie Walters ) think of Streep with Lily Tomlyn in the Altman film and you 'll understand what I wa hoping for . I wa embarrassed in particular by Pierce Brosnam and Colin Firth . The audience , however , seemed to enjoy it so it probably it 's just me .

This movie doe a great job of explaining the problem that we faced and the fear that we had before we put man into space . As a history of space flight , it is still used today in classroom that can get one of the rare print of it . Disney ha shown it on `` Vault Disney '' and I wish they would do so again .

In an alternate 1950s , where an outbreak of the undead ( caused by a mysterious 'space-dust ' ) ha been contained through the use of special electronic collar , a young loner , Timmy , find a friend in Fido ( Billy Connelly ) , his family 's recently acquired domesticated zombie . Fido quickly becomes a surrogate father to Timmy , whose real dad is unable to adequately express his love for his son ( or for his hot-to-trot wife , played by the gorgeous Carrie-Anne Moss ) having been psychologically scarred a a child ( when he wa forced to shoot his own father , who tried to eat him ! ) . Timmy run into a spot of bother , however , when his putrid pal 's collar go on the blink , and he attack and kill an elderly neighbour . With the authority on Fido 's trail , trouble brewing with a pair of local bully , and his mother forming a bond with their undead house-help , will Timmy be able to hold on to his new found friend ? A refreshing take on the whole zombie schtick , Fido is a thoroughly entertaining , deliciously dark comedy that should appeal to anyone with a slightly twisted sense of humour . Taking the Romero zombie-verse and transplanting it into 1950s small town America is a stroke of genius , and the result is simply one of the most original film to tackle the whole 'reanimated dead ' theme that I have seen . Connelly 's Fido is a cinematic zombie worthy of inclusion in the Undead Movie Hall of Fame , along with Day Of The Dead 's Bub , and Return Of The Living Dead 's Tarman ; it is not often I feel empathy for a walking corpse , but The Big Yin 's performance is so fine that I actually found myself rooting for the big blue bag of pu ! The rest of the cast also give commendable performance , with young K'Sun Ray ( a Timmy ) and Ms.Moss deserving special mentionsRay , because , for one so young , he put in a particularly assured turn , and Moss because she is so bloody yummy ! This is the third zombie film that I have watched this week ( the others being the somewhat disappointing Planet Terror and the rather fun Flight Of The Living Dead ) , and , to my surprise , it is also the best . Director Andrew Currie ha given fan of the genre something truly original to treasure and is a talent to be watched in the future . 8.5 out of 10 , rounded up to 9 for IMDb .

An extremely down-to-earth , well made and acted `` Rodeo '' Western . No gussied up star needed here a all cast member were regular people telling a real life story about a rodeo hustler and his entourage in the 60 's and 70 's West . But hat off particularly to Slim Pickens for giving what I think wa his signature performance , especially given the fact that he had been a rodeo clown in real life . His role went far beyond the mere clown role a he deeply dealt with all the `` ups and down '' of the hard-nosed rodeo life and the psychological devastation that so frequently surround such a life style . He and Mr. Coburn teamed up extremely well a partner , not only on the circuit itself , but also in the real world outside the corral . Also , check out Anne Archer a Coburn 's Native American love interest in the latter part of the movie . Must have been one of her first role . Not a flashy , perhaps , a `` Junior Bonner '' , but equally heart rendering and impacting in it portrayal . Thanks to the Encore Western Channel for showing this true grit of an under-rated movie from time to time .

Despite some review being distinctly Luke-warm , I found the story totally engrossing and even if some critic have described the love story a 'Mills and Boon ' , so what ? It is good to see a warm , touching story of real love in these cynical time . Many in the audience were sniffing and surreptitiously dabbing their eye . You really believe that the young Victoria and Albert are passionately fond of each other , even though , for political reason , it wa an arranged marriage . I did feel though that Sir John Conroy , who wa desperate to control the young Queen , is perhaps played too like a pantomime villain . As it is rumoured that he wa in fact , the real father of Victoria ( a a result of an affair with her mother The Duchess of Kent ) it would have been interesting to explore this theory . Emily Blunt is totally convincing a the young Princess , trapped in the stifling palace with courtier and politician out to manipulate her . She brilliantly portrays the strength of character and determination that eventually made Victoria a great Queen of England , which prospered a never before , under her long reign . I believe word of mouth recommendation will ensure great success for this most enjoyable and wonderful looking movie .

`` American Nightmare '' is officially tied , in my opinion , with `` It 's Pat ! '' for the WORST MOVIE OF ALL TIME . Seven friend ( oddly resembling the K-Mart version of the cast of `` Friends '' ) gather in a coffee shop to listen to American Nightmare , a pirate radio show . It 's hosted by a guy with a beard . That 's the most exciting aspect of his show . Chandler , Monica , Joey , and ... oh wait , I mean , Wayne , Jessie , and the rest of the bad one-liner spouting gang all take turn revealing their biggest fear to the bearded DJ . Unbeknownst to them , a crazed nurse/serial killer is listening ... Crazy Nurse then proceeds to torture Ross and Rachel and ... wait , sorry again ... by making their fear come to life . These fear include such stunner a `` voodoo '' and being gone down on by old lady with denture . No . Really . This movie wa , in a word , rotten . Crazy Nurse 's killing spree lack motivation , there 's nothing to make the viewer `` jump , '' the ending blow , and -- again -- voodoo ? If you have absolutely no regard for your loved one , rent `` American Nightmare '' with them . If you care for your loved one -- even a little bit -- go to your local Blockbuster , rent all of the copy of `` American Nightmare '' and hide them in your freezer .

First off , I have to say that I loved the book Animal Farm . I read it with my 9th grade class , and it wa great . We also decided that watching the movie would be beneficial . The movie wa so disappointing to me . The movie cut out some character , and miss a lot of the main point of the book . It skip around a lot , and doe n't explain anything in detail . If someone wa watching this movie without having first read the book , they would be confused . The most disappointing thing in this movie to me , wa the ending . The ending in the book wa the most powerful , and in the movie , they changed it ! It wa supposed to be the pig and men in an alliance and sort of `` melting '' together , but instead , the movie made it seem like the animal were going to rebel against the pig . To sum up , I do n't think that this movie captured the real meaning that Orwell portrayed in his book .

This movie wa extremely boring . I only laughed a few time . I decided to rent it when I noticed William Shatner 's name on the cover . It 's all about this little kid who get picked on all the time by his classmate . When wandering the street looking for old lady to assist , he meet a prostitute . She take him to a club called the Playground , where he befriends several pimp . When mayor Tony Gold ( Shatner ) decides to take over the pimp business , Lil ' Pimp must lay down for his homies . The animation is n't very good in this . It look like it wa made with Macromedia , which I 'm sure it wa . It doe n't suck , it 's just the sort of choppy flash animation that people have gotten used to over recent year . The humor in this is not very good , I did n't think any of it wa funny .

I wa disgusted by this movie . No it wa n't because of the graphic sex scene , it wa because it ruined the image of Artemisia Gentileschi . This movie doe not hold much truth about her and her art . It show one piece of art work that she did ( Judith Beheading Holofernese ) but show that being entered a testimony in the rape trial when she did not paint her first Judith for a year after the trial . I do n't know if you understood this from the movie , probably not , Tassi wa not a noble character . He RAPED Artemisia . It wa not love , it wa rape . He did not claim to accept false charge of rape to stop her from suffering while she wa tortured . According to the rape transcript he continued to claim that he never carnally knew Artemisia ( aka had sex with ) while she state over and over again `` It 's true '' . I encourage all of you people to go out and find about the real Artemisia and see what she is really about . Do n't base all of your knowledge on this fictional movie . I encourage you to do some research , Artemisia really doe have interesting story behind her and some amazing art work . Do n't see the movie , but find out the true story of Artemisia .

Such a joyous world ha been created for u in Pixar 's A Bug 's Life ; we 're immersed in a universe which could only be documented this enjoyably on film , but more precisely a universe which could only be documented through the world of animation . For those who have forgotten what a plentiful and exuberant world animation can offer  when it 's in the right hand that is  A Bug 's Life is a warm reminder . We walk out of the film with an equally-warm feeling , and a sense of satisfaction derivative of only high-calibre film production . It is only Pixar 's second animated feature . The sub-group of Disney made their spectacular debut and perhaps entirely inadvertent mark on the film world three year prior in 1995 , with their landmark movie Toy Story . It wa a movie which defied convention , re-invented and breathed new life into animation and defined a whole new level of excellence . Now , they return with their sophomore effort which , to be honest , draw a creeping sense of cynicism in u all prior to seeing the film . After all , it 's a film about ant . Well , all walk of the insect and bug world are covered in A Bug 's Life , but it is the ant which is the focal point in this film , a human are the focal point in drama , romance and so on . How can such an insignificant specie of animal such a an ant act a the protagonist of a movie , let alone provide the entire premise of a feature film ? Surely they jest . However , we forget that in Toy Story , a bunch of toy-box item were able to become the grandest , most inspiring and lovable bunch of animated hero and villain ever concocted . The guy at Pixar manage to pull off the same feat , and manage to turn a bunch of dirty and miniscule bug into the most endearing and pleasant gang of vermin you 'll probably ever encounter . Not only are they all entirely amiable and likable  there is n't an unpleasant character in sight ; even the villain are riveting character  but they 're colourful , they 're eclectic , and they 're idiosyncratic . And the array of character is also gargantuan for lack of a better term , only adding the rich layer of distinctiveness already plastered onto A Bug 's Life from the beginning . We shall start with our main character , and our hero . His name is Flik ( David Foley ) , and his character is rather generic to say the least . Out of the thousand of faithful and obedient worker ant residing on the lush , beautiful Ant Island , he is the one considered the 'black sheep ' of the clan , a seen in the opening moment of the movie when he inadvertently destroys the season 's harvest with his antic . The problem arises in the fact that the ant ' harvest is for a bunch of greedy grasshopper led by Hopper ( Kevin Spacey ) , who are eager to continue to assert their wrath and autocracy amongst the puny little ant ; when they show up to Ant Island for their annual banquet and see that their offering is gone , they go insane , for lack of a better term . Hopper offer a proposition to save the ant from total extinction at his pack 's hand ; however , it 's a negotiation which is simply impossible to fulfil . The cog and clockwork in Flik 's mind run at full steam now despite his guilt and shame , and he offer to leave Ant Island in search of some mighty bug warrior who can come to the colony 's rescue and fight off Hopper and the grasshopper . If you think about it , A Bug 's Life bear some heavy resemblance to the plot line 's of Akira Kurosawa 's classic Seven Samurai , or the American remake The Magnificent Seven , in which a village of hapless but good-hearted folk are threatened by malevolent and wicked enemy  one lone village-dweller go in search for help in the big city , find it and return to the colony to drive off evil . In A Bug 's Life , the help come in the form of a down-and-out circus troupe who is mistakenly perceived by Flik a warrior in a bar-room brawl . Much amusement come out of these scene , and much amusement come out of these circus troupe bug . Among them are an erudite stick insect ( David Hyde Pierce ) , a side-splitting obese German caterpillar by the name of Heimlich and a quasi-femme fatale ladybug who 's in fact a gritty and masculine ladybug ( Dennis Hopper ) . It 's exceedingly enjoyable watching these bug on-screen , a it is watching the bug and the insect interact on-screen , a is the entire movie collectively . As I 've said , much amusement and mirth come out of their character and joyous interaction with one another , which give way to a bevy of hilarious line , wonderfully suspenseful and riveting situation and overall a dazzling movie . What make A Bug 's Life even better is that the film is n't restricted simply to child a many may perceive it to be , although child would indeed find more entertainment out of this film  the clichéd kid-friendly situation are a bit more abundant than we 'd like . However , it 's easy to ignore this fault , and it 's incredulously easy to enjoy this film . Although A Bug 's Life may not reach the dizzying and landmark standard set by it predecessor , this is still a superb movie , and the start of something promising here . Pixar have proved that they 're not just a one-hit wonder , but instead a much-gifted and talented group of film artist in Hollywood . They raise the bar endlessly , and when someone always manages to top their standard , it 's only always by themselves . What more is there to say about A Bug 's Life other than : see it ; it 's not quite the best which we 've seen from the folk at Emeryville , California , but this beat out the lot of it year  and I 'll be damned if this is n't the best animated feature of 1998 . 8.5/10

What an empty and lack lustre rendition of the classic novel . I do wish people would stop messing about with classic when they clearly have no idea of the real intention or point of the original . This version is no different . I felt that the Ralph Fiennes version is much worse though a the casting of Juliette brioche a Kathy ha got to be the worst casting decision EVER ... anyway back to this version . It aim to make the story relevant to a contemporary setting and in a musical style . It succeeds in both but high art it is nit . Throwaway viewing for a rainy day maybe ... The direction wa average and the editing abysmal . Worse than the old Quincy . Deepak Verma doe a great turn a Hindley and is in fact one of Britains wasted talent . The part of Heath wa played with great charm and belief and I think that the casting is the strongest point of this project . Although a more talented director would have made better use of the facility he had . Its clear that he wa a director for hire and did n't instill the project with the passion that it deserved .

My Father The Hero used to be my favorite movie when I wa Younger . It 's about Andre , a divorced french man who want to take his beautiful daughter ( katharine heigl } on a vacation , hoping to get a little closer to her . But of course , Nicole is n't that easy to get along with , she just started puberty , i 'm guessing . She is angry and hurt that her father wa never there for her and decides to give him a hard time . One day at the beach , Nicole meet handsome Ben , and she make up a wild story about her and her dad . The whole island get involved and the movie turn into a hilarious wild entertaining movie . I would give My Father The Hero 8/10

It is surprising that a production like this get made these day , especially for television . Considering the strong sexual theme and explicit lovemaking scene , not to mention lesbianism , this ha been given superb treatment and direction . The set and costume are flawless , the direction is stylish and the character are likeable . There is a fair amount of humor but it ha surprisingly dark interlude . The protagonist is really a tragic figure , but not devoid of happiness . Also , this production avoids the mistake most films/shows make when dealing with homosexuality/lesbianism . The character are very human . It seems that to allow people to be comfortable with watching gay and lesbian on TV and movie most show fill it full of cliche and make the character obsessed with being gay . Not so with this . In Tipping the Velvet , the protagonist is hardly aware of what being lesbian mean ! The BBC have made some wonderful production in the past , and this adventurous period piece only confirms their standard of excellence on all front .

I just do n't get some of the big premise of this episode - that Miranda is so remarkable , and that there 's anything so ugly it would make you insane . Someone here made the remark that maybe it 's the frequency of the light wave or something rather than it being ugliness . Miranda is just a jerk . The episode is slow , inconsistent and way too talky . I also do n't quite understand why Kolos is an ambassador - why doe n't the Federation just leave the damn Medusans be ? There 's one part I do like , when Kolos is speaking through Spock about the loneliness of the human experience . Overall , I love TOS and even at it lamest , I 'll always tune in . This episode though - mmm , I would n't purchase it except for a used copy under $ 3 .

This is one of my all time favorite movie and I would recommend it to anyone . On my list of favorite movie ( mental list , mind ) the only one on par with it are movie such a The Lord of the Rings series , Spirited Away and Fly Away Home . I can really relate to the main character Jess . At the start of the movie she 's a shy girl with a slightly odd background who ha a lot more friend who are boy than that are girl . She really suck you into her life . I also certainly ca n't fault any of the protagonist 's acting , or anyone else 's in the film . The soccer wa interesting to watch even for someone like me who ha no idea of the rule . The movie is never boring . The romance is really cute and did n't make me blush tooooo hard ! One thing that really made it though wa the Indian factor . Jess ' parent are Indian and there are many colourful Indian convention throughout the film providing a very interesting cultural insight a well a everything else . The Indian people are also hilarious ! Essentially this is a coming of age film about choosing the path you want and fighting for it . Feel good comedy are becoming my favorite movie genre thanks to this film . They 're funny , they 're refreshing and they make you feel good ! ^_~

This is probably the first entry in the `` Lance O'Leary/Nurse Keat '' detective series ; in subsequent O'Leary film , he wa played by much younger actor than Guy Kibbee . A group of relative ( all played by well-known character actor ) gather in an old house ( on a rainy nite , of course ! ) to speak to a wealthy relative , who go into a coma . While they wait for him to recover , all sort of mysterious goings-on happen , including a couple of murder . A creepy film ; worth seeing !

This animation ha a very simple and straightforward good vs. evil plot and is all about action . What set it apart from other animation is how well the human movement are animated . It wa really beautiful seeing the fleeing woman running around on the screen from left to right and look around , her movement were done so well . Why do n't they use this rotoscopic technique more these day ? It 's quite effective . Fire and Ice , in it 's prehistoric setting and scarcely dressed woman , wa clearly devoted to showing the beautiful damsel in distress in various sexy way , her voluptuous body serving a pure eyecandy . Some may hate this and regard it a yet another moronic male sexual fantasy , others ( including plenty of woman ) will adore it 's esthetic quality . I for sure did not mind ! Bakshi just love animating lushious , voluptuous babe , a can also be seen in Cool World , and I do n't think he ha to apoligize since it 's pretty much animation for adult . But I had also enjoyed this animation a a child and I never forgot it . This one wa just special , so different from the standard Disney or Anime fare , and for that reason alone well worth the watch since it 's possibly Bakshi 's finest . For those who like animation with lushious woman : try Space Adventure Cobra a well . I give Fire and Ice 8 out of 10 .

I am not a Faulkner fan ( which is considered sacrilegious , especially since I grew up near the author 's hometown ) ; however , I think this is an excellent movie . On par with the quality of the movie `` To Kill a Mocking Bird '' . If you have n't seen it , buy it anyway . It 's well worth having in your permanent collection . TCM recently played the movie a a part of the Race on Film series . I wish they 'd play it more often . Very moving . On a side note , the folk from Oxford , Mississippi , will also enjoy seeing the footage of the town square a it wa back in the 1940 's . The Courthouse , City Hall , etc . : They 're all on screen . I never knew the movie wa filmed there until I noticed the familiarity of the building . When I saw the arch in the front of City Hall , I began to get suspicious . Look closely at the pennant on Chick 's wall : You 'll see two for Ole Miss !

Chinese Ghost Story III is a totally superfluous sequel to two excellent fantasy film . The film delivers the spell-casting special effect that one can expect , but fails painfully on all other front . The actor all play extremely silly caricature . You have to be still in diaper to find their slapstick humor even remotely funny . The plot is predictable , and the development is sometimes erratic and often slow . Towards the end , the movie begin to resemble old Godzilla film , including shabby larger-than-life special effect and a ( well , yet another ) ghost with a Godzilla head . Maybe I would have grinned if I wa expecting camp . It is astonishing to see what trash fantasy fan have to put up with - in this case because somebody thought they could squeeze a little extra money out of a successful formula . They wo n't be able to do it again : the cash cow is now dead a a dodo .

If I had known this movie wa filmed in the exasperating and quease-inducing Dogme 95 style , I would never have rented it . Nevertheless , I took a dramamine for the seasickness and gave it a shot . I lasted a very , very , very long forty minute before giving up . It 's just boring , pretentious twaddle . The last French movie I saw wa `` Romance '' and it too wa pretty dismal , but at least the camera wa steady and not breathing down the neck of the character all the time . I am baffled at the continuing popularity of Dogme 95 overseas -- it 'll catch on in America about the same time a the next big outbreak of leprosy . ( It 's called Dogme 95 because that 's the average number of time the actor are poked in the eye by the camera . )

First , let me just comment on what I liked about the movie . The special effect were fantastic , and very rarely did I feel like I wa watching a video game . There , that is the last nice thing I have to say about this film . In fact , I would just like everyone reading this to take note that I ca n't even put into word how hard it wa for me to write this review without swearing . I have innumerable complaint about the film , but four major complaint jump to mind . My first major complaint ha to do with the incredible cheesiness of the `` plot twist '' ( if you can call it that since most people probably saw it coming a mile away ) where Lois 's 5 year-old son turn out to be the super-powered child of Superman . When the cry super-child throw a piano at Lex 's henchman to save his mother , I almost got up and left the theater . Singer could have made a much better Superman movie without resorting to cheap gimmick like a seemingly fragile but latently super-powered illegitimate child . It 's been 5 day since I saw the movie and I still want to vomit . My next major complaint ha to do with the fact that Superman lift a continent made out of kryptonite up into outer space . It doe n't take comic book guy from the Simpsons to point out what 's wrong with that . I do n't know how many comic book Brian Singer ha read , but when Superman is exposed to even a small amount of kryptonite he barely ha the strength to stay on his foot . Whoever had the idea to have him fly a large island made out of his greatest weakness into space ha no business being associated with any Superman-related project ever again . The concept is a ridiculous a making a Dracula movie where the title character ha a stake through his heart and still manages to fly a spaceship made out of garlic into the sun . Why not just have Superman eat kryptonite ? He can eat it and then brush his teeth with it , and then go to sleep in kryptonite pajama . That 's not any more absurd then having him hoist a continent of kryptonite into space and then fall powerless through the atmosphere without burning up in re-entry or splattering all over central park when he hit the ground . My third major complaint ha to do with the fact that Singer slap movie-goers across the face with religious symbolism the entire movie . I have to take issue with his characterization of Superman a the only son of a God-like Jor-el sent to Earth to be a savior . Jor-el wa n't all-wise , he wa just a scientist . And he did n't send his son to earth to be a savior , he threw him in a rocket and hurriedly fired it into space because his planet wa about to explode . I 'll buy the Christ allegory if Brian Singer can show me the part in the Bible where God sends Christ to Earth because Heaven wa about to explode , and then radioactive piece of Heaven become Christ 's primary weakness . Furthermore , the `` crucifixion '' scene where Luthor stab Superman in the side with a kryptonite `` spear '' just make me want to slam my face into a brick until I 'm too brain-dead to notice the brazenly obvious and inappropriate symbolism that will be tainting the man of steel for the foreseeable future . They might a well rename this movie `` Superman Returns : the Passion of the Christ . '' And speaking of Luthor , my last major complaint ha to do with Singer 's depiction of Lex Luthor . Lex Luthor is a shrewd , cold-hearted business tycoon who is more apt to run for President ( which he doe in the comic ) than try to destroy the world . The man want money and power ; he want to be in charge , not wreck everything . Yet the Luthor we see Superman Returns , a well a all the previous Superman movie , is a wacky theatrical dunce who come up with zany scheme to destroy the world . If Singer had the slightest loyalty to the character instead of the ( quite awful ) previous Superman movie , this film might not be such an unbearable travesty . Maybe Singer 's next project can be a Batman movie where he focus on the interpretation of Batman from 1960s TV show . ZAM ! WHAP ! POW ! ! To summarize , I do n't know what I hate more , the movie itself or the fact that so many people seem to be giving it good review . Everyone is entitled to their opinion , but if you do n't hate this movie then your opinion is wrong . I sincerely encourage anyone who read this not to see this movie if you have n't already . Do n't see it , do n't buy it when it come out on DVD , do n't rent it ... basically do n't contribute any money towards it in any way . This movie doe not deserve to make any money . In fact , I think that for every person that see this movie , Bryan Singer should be fined 45 billion dollar . If you 're a Superman fan and you really want to see this movie , just bend over and have someone kick you in the ball and you 'll get the same experience without having to waste 2 hour of your time .

This is one of the best TV production of a musical ever . I have heard the Merman cast album , the Angela Lansbury album , I have seen Tyne Daly live , and I 've seen the Rosalind Russell movie countless time . I think Bette is if not the best , then tied with the best . She capture not just the bravura , but also the pathos of Mama Rose . I wa never a Natalie Wood fan , so I really enjoyed Cynthia Gibb , in what is arguably her best role . Everything from the costume to the set to the supporting performance is wonderful . The three stripper , led by the always-dependable Christine Ebersole are hard to top . There wa supposed to be a TV production of Mame a few year back , with Cher , but I think Bette would be the best bet ( pun intended ) for Auntie Mame .

I am sorry to say that this film is indeed bad . It reminds me of a c-grade porn movie with one major difference : no porn . The story and dialogue need a complete overhaul . Maybe then the bad acting would not have been a noticeable . At the very least , the pacing should have been picked up . While I accept that this had a low budget and the director did a good job visually given what little resource he had , he should have spent more time on the story or better yet , get someone else to write it . Many of the action scene were just pointless . It wa a complete waste of my time .

Is it a perfect movie ? No . It is a weird adaptation from a sci-fi book and it feature vampire from space , naked beauty and the British army efficiency . When I first saw this movie I wa rather young and all I can remember is the feeling of awe for the movie and Mathilda May . Actually , if it were n't for this gorgeous lady being naked the whole movie , I probably would n't have rated it so high , but given her sheer magnificence , I am now actually considering voting it up ! Lucky for me I got reminded of the movie and watched it again now . Imagine Raiders of the Lost Ark or Poltergeist special effect splattered unto a rather decent sci-fi story , but with completely over the top performance . I still enjoyed the movie tremendously ( a well a Mathilda May ) , but it wa a mixture of nostalgia , comparing with the crap movie they make today and actually wanting more when it ended . Bottom line : if you are a sci-fi fan you are not allowed to miss this movie . Oh , and did I mention Mathilda May is young , beautiful and naked ?

Overall I wa rather impressed with the pilot . The initial first fifteen minute were worrying , a it did feel the creator were trying to create a science fiction version of The O.C but this fear is rectified when a terrorist incident occurs and from here the show step into theme and situation that I very rarely see television tackle . BSG dealt with theme such a monotheism , existentialism , reality , death and terrorism but they were primarily subtext , there for the viewer to contemplate on or ignore if they so choose . Here on the other hand these subject are the focus of the show and I personally found myself evoking such work a Ghost In The Shell and The Matrix a reference point while watching and being surprised by how well the theme were being discussed . I think if you are a fan of the two I just mentioned or other films/television show , which deal with the subject I referenced , I think you will find at least something here . In term of a starting point to explain how the situation we know in BSG came about I believe they handled it in a very interesting way , I especially liked how they explained where the Cylon 's belief in one God came from and the creation of Caprica had just enough advanced and contemporary technology thrown in to make it appear in the future but not completely alien to u a viewer . The only real weak point I noticed were the relationship between the Greystone parent and the actress who play 'Lacy Rand ' . While I like Eric Stoltz and Paula Malcomson individually , together their scene seemed to lack chemistry , at this point it could simply be down to developing their character , but this is something I think need work . I also found Magda Apanowicz to be unconvincing in her role . This again could be down to experience and time needed to develop , but throughout the episode her acting appeared forced and not completely confident . Based on the pilot I greatly look forward to seeing where 'Caprica ' go in the future and hopefully it will touch the greatness that BSG once did .
