Thought the guy did a good job though . I keep hoping we 'll find a good 8 star Christmas movie to watch this week . The dart throwing . Had to laugh at that too . We 've still got 3 more on the DVR to watch , maybe we 'll get lucky . Oh yeah , I figured the guy out pretty quickly and nailed it when he picked up the flower and then drove out with his cousin . I told my daughter they were on their way to the cemetery . And how stupid wa it that the two gal followed them there spying on them ? Creepy .

This is one of the best movie . It is one of my favorite . A movie with good acting . The story is very sensitive and touching . Good camera work also . The name of the actress and actor are not at the top of the American Star list . However , they give equal or better performance than the top of the list . It is such a pleasure to see a movie about true love , romance , friendship without having to endure watching someone having to kick-box their way to save the world . If you do n't like this movie then you have no heart or feeling . Then go watch a sport movie . There is no killing or horror here . See the movie . It is a must . TH

`` Bell Book and Candle '' wa shown recently on cable . Not having seen it for a while , we decided to take another look at this comedy . Based on the James Van Druten 's Broadway hit , which wa a vehicle for Rex Harrison and Lilli Palmer in the early fifty , the film wa adapted for the screen by Daniel Taradash . The film wa directed by Richard Quine , who turned the play into a delightful comedy . Evidently , judging by some of the comment submitted by IMDb , the big issue seems to be the pairing of the two star , who had collaborated on `` Vertigo '' , released the same year . Movie audience did n't think anything about the age difference when this film wa released . In fact , most of the aging male star of that period were always involved with much younger woman . The film set in Manhattan during Christmas is a delightful comedy that ha enchanted viewer . Kim Novak wa at the height of her beauty a it 's clear the camera adored her no matter what wa she playing . As the witch that becomes human , her Gillian is charming . James Stewart , who play the publisher Shep ' Henderson , is also seen at his best . Mr. Stewart wa an excellent comedy actor who show in here why he wa at the top . In supporting role the wonderful Elsa Lanchester , playing Queenie , is a welcome addition to any movie , a she prof here . Jack Lemmon 's Nicky Holroyd , the brother of Gillian , is also good . Ernie Kovacs is also seen a the writer Sidney Radlitch . This is an excellent way to spend a winter night at home watching `` Bell Book and Candle '' .

It is very hard to come up with new information about JFK Jr. and this fine movie had very little of it , but it wa a joy to watch . The casting wa very good and the script , while somewhat like a documentary , wa also good . My only complaint wa that it wa n't long enough . Perhaps a two-part movie could have told u more about his `` pre-George '' day and his relationship with his mother , sister , and other relative . Some of the material in the book , `` American Son , '' by Richard Blow would have enhanced the movie a lot . WTBS should be applauded for producing such an entertaining movie .

This entire movie is worth watching just for the magnificent final moment - it the best ending of any movie I 've ever seen . Perfect , beautiful , funny , simply wonderful . I found this movie delightful , even with it 's French taking-itself-too-seriously deep meaning thing going on . I loved it - it 's a great love story . And I loved the way Algerians were woven in - and by the way , the music during the final credit is great . I want the CD !

Granted , this seems like a good idea . Steve Martin , Goldie Hawn , and John Cleese in a Neil Simon comedy . Where can you go wrong ? Watch the movie , and you 'll find out . In truth , Martin , the lead , is mis-cast . He 's not doing the great slapstick he 's known for , from movie like `` The Jerk '' , but instead play a sort of in-between character that doe n't work . Hawn , with no one to play off of , is terrible . Cleese is the only even partially funny member . To top it off , the plot is pretty stupid . I ca n't say how much of it may have been changed , but the character seem to lack the slightest bit of common sense . They blunder through New York , not doing anything right , and unfortuneatly , nothing funny . Not only is the whole premise completely unbelievable , it seems to give the message that people who do n't live in New York are n't very bright , a theme repeated throughout the movie . In summation , instead of seeing this , go rent the original `` Odd Couple '' again .

Halloween 666 ( 1995 ) The producer 's cut review ! Halloween 666 start of with a recap of the horrific ending to Part five . If you thought the last chapter wa dark , this one will really blow your mind . A mysterious `` Man in Black '' ha raided the Haddonfield Police Department freeing Micheal Myers . In the process poor Jamie Lloyd wa abducted by strange cultist . What they want with her ? Who know , but let 's just say her long suffering will end soon . Doctor Loomis is back spending the rest of his twilight year trying to stop Michael Myers from killing any more innocent ( good luck ) . A friend of Loomis , Doctor Wynn come back after a four sequel hiatus to help the good doctor . Another old face from part one guest star a well . This dark and dreary sequel wa dismantled during the post production editing . For some reason the distributor felt that the final product wa n't worth the average horror film watcher 's time . So they decide to dumb it down . Then after having the film sit on the shelf for several month it laid an egg at the box office . No matter what they did to the film , they made it worse . They should have left well enough alone . Hey , the film company know better than the filmmaker now .... do n't they ? Producer 's Cut : Highly recommended Released version : Not recommended

Definitely a `` must see '' for all fan of film noir . Thanks to a fine script and crisp , razor sharp direction a top cast come together and work like a well oiled clock to produce a crackerjack psychological thriller . Wonderful characterization articulate the movie 's powerful message of racial and religious tolerance . It 's difficult and almost unjust to single out any one particular performance because there is n't a weak link in the entire company but Robert Ryan a the hateful and violent white supremacist is truly spine chilling . Making this film in the 1940s would have taken a lot of courage . Now , all these year later , at a time when contemporary movie are dominated by a ridiculous over abundance of foul language , bare breast , crummy acting and deafening soundtrack it 's refreshing to get back to the basic of quality film making with a viewing treat like `` Crossfire '' . Another low budget gem from the Hollywood archive .

I rented this movie on the merit of what the trailer showed , and of course Sir Anthony Hopkins . If Jackson Pollack teamed up with David Lynch , and Timothy Leary to make a movie , this would be the end result . I do n't think I 've seen a movie like it that made an LSD trip look like an episode of Sesame Street . It 's a bunch of set piece where the character flash in and out of reality , or various reality , and the film doe n't culminate into anything until the last 5 minute , where all of a sudden it make sense . I wrote a scathing review on my movie review blog that essentially give everything away , and I wo n't do that here . It 's a well acted piece of cinema , and the soundtrack wa written by Sir Anthony Hopkins , and let me say this , if there 's one redeeming feature to this film , it 's the music . It fit perfectly . Some of the dialogue is unbelievably good , and unbelievably bad all at the same time . I enjoyed part of this movie , I truly did , and once you get to the end of it , you 'll actually figure out what 's truly going on . It 's unfortunate that you have to wade through 2 hour of crazy to get to a salient point , which minimizes the effect of the entire movie . I give it a 3 out of 10 for the simple fact that the real problem with this film is n't the acting , it 's everything .

If you are a traveller , if there is a fire burning into your heart , if you 'd call `` home '' every place on earth , but none of them can give you enough , if you are always looking for the next thing and if you believe the other part of your soul is somewhere out there , see this movie and you 'll find out a little , but wonderful , piece of life sitting next to you .

What are Forest Whitaker and Clifton Collins Jr. doing in this ? Light It Up is a ridiculously melodramatic piece on problem in low income area school . While the topic is one that need to be addressed , the film us every cliche in the genre and come off a a textbook popcorn flick . The character are cutout from the inner city version of The Breakfast Club or even The Faculty . Watch this with your child when they turn 13 or 14 . With them , it could be an outlet for a lesson on current social problem . For anyone older , it will be nothing more than something to watch and spit on at 4 in the morning , a I did recently on Bravo . Matter of fact , what wa this doing on Bravo ?

There are plenty of comment already posted saying exactly how I felt about this film so Ill keep it short . `` The Grinch '' I thought wa marvellous - Jim Carrey is a truly talented , physical comedian a well a being a versatile clever actor ( in my opinion ) . Mike Myers on the other hand get his laugh by being annoying . I used to like him very much in his `` Waynes World '' and `` So I Married an Axe Murderer '' day - but Ive never been fond of Austin Powers and `` the Cat In The Hat '' ha just finished me off . This film wa horrible - the gag were horrible ! inappropriate for child not only in adult content but in the fact that some of them were so dated they havent amused anyone for 50 year ! The plot wa messy , messy , messy ! Its a shame really because the child were very likeable a wa `` Mom '' . They probably could have picked a better villain than Alec Baldwin - but he could have pulled it off if it were n't for Myers ugly , revolting over-acted portrayal of the Cat . I mean - did Myers even glance at a script ? Was one written ? The other actor seemed to have one - but the Cat just seemed to be winging it ! On the other hand I would like to mention that the set and prop were marvellous ! ! ! But unfortunately they cant save this film . Poor Dr Seuss - the man wa a genius ! Dont ruin his reputation by adapting his work in a such a lazy , messy way ! ! ! 1/10

I 'm surprised about the many female voter who even give this film better mark . My thought about this film wa that the target audience is adult and male . Whipped and tortured woman , merciless revenge and a high body count are typical ingredient , introduced into film history by the spaghetti subgenre . The opening and the hand-smashing are DJANGO rip-off . THE SHOOTER however lack the style of e.g . DJANGO . Score , acting and cinematography are mediocre at best but if you look for the above mentioned ingredient you are in the right place here . And the actor do n't have an Italian accent . 4 / 10 .

Matthau and Lemmon are at their very best in this one - everyone else in the movie are also great . The Dialogue is excellent and very , very witty - and the scene where Lemmon 's character attempt to clear out his sinus in a restaurant have me rolling on the floor with laughter every time I see it . Anyone who happened to see the not so great sequel should not be turned away from the original . I recommend this wonderful movie to everyone - I just love it . And the fact the Jack Lemmon play his character so straight forward with tragic overtone only add to the hilariousness in my opinion . These two great guy made a string of movie together , but this one is the best - no doubt .

This is an incredible film . I ca n't remember the last time I saw a Swedish movie this layered . It 's funny , it 's tragic , it 's compelling , and most of all it 's a slice of Swedish small town life . It crush the clichés , and dwells deeper . It make you feel connected , not only to the main character , but to all the character . Big city girl tracing back to her root , her small hometown , to celebrate her father 's 70th birthday , crossing path with people she ha n't met in several year . Although the story itself is n't unique , it offer a fresh approach . The center of the story is the relationship between three sister ( on different stage in life ) , who are n't very close . Or at least do n't realize how close they are . One key reason that make it so easy to connect to the people in this film is the immaculate cast . First , I 'm more than pleased about the fact that there are absolutely no so-called ' A-list ' Swedish actor in this film . Usually there is a handful of actor that ha the ability to find their way into almost every major production in Sweden . This time the production company managed to keep it real by casting actor who actually seem to love their profession . Sofia Helin is probably the first Swedish actress since Eva Röse to prove that you do n't need word to convey an emotion . The writing is also very appealing . The dialogue is more than believable , and compared with other Swedish film from the past year or two , it 's ahead by mile . Maria Blom control everything from the beginning , and if you did n't know , you would never guess that this is her first time writing AND directing a feature length film . I ca n't wait for her next one . Once you start watching this , you really want to see it through .

Just how bad ? Well , compared to this movie , Cannibal Holocaust is Citizen Kane . There 's the stilted acting , the atrocious dialogue , the half baked plot and like it companion piece way too much in the way of on screen animal slaughter that wa actually done . Unlike Holocaust , Ferox is a straight forward movie . It doe n't pretend to be a pseudo documentary . In some way that help the production in that the film is very sharp and crisp compared to Holocaust 's graininess . Unfortunately , we are once again given a group of people who are morally reprehensible . They torture the native and essentially bring everything that they get upon themselves . There 's really nothing in this film that make it worth your while . I wa fairly lenient with my review of Holocaust due to some actual attempt at a statement and style , but in Ferox 's case there is no reason to watch this unless you solely get off on blood and gore .

Some of the secondary actor try , really hard . And camera shot in the desert are quite lovely . Otherwise , this film is horrible . William Shatner 's character , Harvey , is an amateur screenwriter . He 's also a psychopath , a man who quite literally escape from a mental institution . Is the point of this film that amateur screenwriter are psychopath ? Harvey will do anything to get his script read and turned into a movie , even if that mean taking a film crew hostage . Do amateur screenwriter ... grovel ? Maybe they do . The film 's setup is way too long . We do n't get to the point of the story until well into the second half . The first half dart and flit among assorted character . `` Shoot Or Be Shot '' is touted a a comedy , but I found it totally not funny . Dialogue contains no subtext . None of the character are believable a real people . They 're all stick figure that perform `` action '' in a way that resembles cartoon character . Indeed , the film is basically a cartoon for adult : silly , inane , birdbrained . I can understand why some actor are in this film . They need the money or the exposure . But what are insider Shatner and Harry Hamlin doing here ? Maybe Shatner want more comedy role . Is this the best he can do ? Is Hamlin that desperate for money ? He used to be a respected actor . What happened ? Even though the story is supposed to be a satire , it come across more a a put-down of amateur screenwriter . Maybe that wa n't the intent . But that 's certainly how the film can be interpreted . As such , the script wa very , very poorly written .

This movie is simply bad . First of all the story is just weird and it 's not good written . It leaf you with question when you 're finished . Sometimes that 's OK , but not in this case . The acting is nothing to write home about . The adult doe a OK job , but the kid , taken in consideration they are kid , doe not a good job . I thought the lead role , Ian Costello a Mickey , wa worst . Well , to be honest I 'm not sure that wa the lead role . Never quite figured who this movie wa about . Mickey or Pete . There were some shot that stood out , but over all there were nothing exiting about the cinematography . The sound , however , wa better . There wa a nice score . A little adventure kind of score , though this did n't look like an adventure film to me . It had some element of an adventure film , but it wa more of a drama . However , it wa hard to tell who this film wa meant for . Children ? Hardly . There is too much language and violence for that . Adults ? I do n't know . It had to many element of a child 's movie in it . It wa like a adult movie in a child movie wrapping . The story wa just weird . I do n't have much of an idea of what it really wa about . You wa thrown right in to it without knowing anything , but there were all the time reference to something you felt you should know . The fact that the child 's parent were dead for instance and that Mickey blamed Pete for it . You expected to get to know what happened , but you never got . All together this movie wa bad and a waste of time . There wa no drive in it . Nothing to really move the story forward . This is not what you spend your Saturday night on .

Though not Hal Hartley 's best work ( my personal favorite is `` Surviving Desire '' ) , there is still much to like about this movie , especially for fan of Hartley 's dialogue . Even to audience new to Hartley , I would definitely recommend this movie over the sophomoric `` Dogma . '' This movie is more intelligent , truer to it source material ( the Bible ) , and more fun than any of the other pre-millennium apocalypse movie . This movie is actually part of the French `` 2000 As Seen By . '' ( 2000 Par Vu ) series ; a such , it is perhaps even a lower-budget film than Hartley 's other work . While the need for simple scene shot with digital camera is understandable in this context , the main problem with this movie is the unfortunate overuse of the blurry/jittery effect . I 'd be happy to never see this effect used in a movie again ; especially at the beginning , it almost make the movie unwatchable . But overlook this flaw , and you 'll be treated to a fine film . Especially notable is Magdalena ( played by P.J . Harvey ) relating how Jesus saved her from being stoned to death ; a short scene I found surprisingly moving . ( Despite the fact that it wa NOT Mary Magdalene that this happened to ; the woman in the Bible wa unnamed . )

I bought this ( it wa only $ 3 , ok ? ) under the title `` Grey Matter '' . The novelty of seeing Sherriff Roscoe in a non-DukesOfHazzard role intrigued me . As the other reviewer warned , it 's a pretty boring tale of a top secret government experiment gone awry . And yes , there are plenty of establishing shot , especially of a house with a pool in front of it . Some of the character and interior are so nondescript I guess the filmmaker worried we might forget who is who , so they keep tipping u off by first showing the outside of the building . It 's actually kinda funny . After awhile the pool shot feel like a tv channel 's station identification logo , reminding u that we are watching `` Grey Matter '' . I also enjoyed two bout of name-calling . At one point an angry test subject taunt somebody in charge by calling her a `` Scientific b * tch ! '' . It 's just a very inadequate insult . Several scene later a different subject let off steam by muttering about that `` scientific b * * tard ! '' . It just sounded very awkward to me . Someday this movie will disappear forever . Another decade from now it will likely be impossible to find any copy of it . Almost like it never happened .

There is a bit of trivia which should be pointed out about a scene early in the movie where Homer watch the attempt of December 6 , 1957 ( at least that wa the video used on the TV he wa watching ) which showed the Vangard launch attempt , which failed . He is next shown reading or dictating a letter to Dr . Von Braun offering condolence about the failure . Von Braun wa at Marshall space flight center in Huntsville working for the Army . The Vanguard project wa by the early Nasa team which wa at what soon became Goddard Space flight center . The army rushed the Jupiter-C , which wa essentially a US made V2 technology , but worked to launch a satellite in response to Russia 's success with Sputnik . This error may have actually been made by Homer , because of the notoriety of Von Braun , but his team did n't have their attempt fail . In fact the underlying Redstone wa flying from 52 and wa the first US man rated booster , used for Shepard 's sub orbital flight , a well a Grissom 's . This is why this sort of movie is so good , a it hopefully will inspire people to read up and spot these bit of trivia , and in the process see what ha been done , and be inspired to do more .

I enjoyed this movie very much . Kristy Swanson Omar epps , and Ice Cube were all great in it . The movie dealt with many issue , and I did n't know if I wa going to like it , but Singelton did a terrific job of creating character that you really cared about .

52-Pick Up never got the respect it should have . It work on many level , and ha a complicated but followable plot . The actor involved give some of their finest performance . Ann-Margret , Roy Scheider , and John Glover are perfectly cast and provide deep character portrayal . Notable too are Vanity , who should have parlayed this into a serious acting career given the unexpected ability she show , and Kelly Preston , who 's character will haunt you for a few day . Anyone who like action combined with a gritty complicated story will enjoy this .

Teenage Exorcist is one of those God-awful film to video that make the viewer give up any expectation of decent entertainment for low brow sexual antic , adolescent humour , and empty writing . This film delivers exactly what it wa trying to deliver . It is about a girl moving into a house where a Baron de Sade ( hmmm ) once lived and finally being drawn to him through her own inner demon . Her sister and brother-in-law , along with an Irish priest , her boyfriend , and a pizza delivery boy , try to save her and exorcise her demon . Well , not much here in way of horror or suspense . In fact , one line from the film pretty much sum up what to expect . Mike ( the girl 's brother-in-law ) ha tied her ( the name is Diane by the way and she is played by Brinke Stevens ) up after trying to chainsaw her sister . He remove a gag from her mouth and say something like , `` This wo n't be the last gag we see tonight . '' Indeed , it wa not . The special effect are cheesy and poorly crafted , and the film make use of this by playing on it comedic appeal . Some of the line and situation are funny . Robert Quarry , old Count Yorga himself , really steal his scene a an Irish priest . He ham it up wailing Biblical verse and crooning Irish song . You know you are in trouble , however , when Eddie Deezen get top billing . Deezen doe his schtick and ha a couple nice moment a well , but the material is just too threadbare than to be anything more than teenage sophomoric time filler . Michael Berryman , from The Hills Have Eyes , also ha a brief but interesting cameo in the film . As for the other thespian , well , they are all pretty good at being pretty mediocre . Stevens is lovely in fishnet stocking and French-cut panty , but beyond that do n't expect too much more from her . Her sister is played by Elena Sahagun , and she show a bit more than Brinke ( a very lovely young lady by the way ) and out act Brinke by mile . Her husband , played by Jay Richardson show off his ability to act and be funny amidst mediocrity . Again , not a bad film to waste a little time that involves NO thinking on . If you are a Robert Quarry fan , watch it for his performance at the very least .

Wenders wa great with Million $ Hotel.I do n't know how he came up with this film ! The idea of giving the situation after spt11 and the view of American Society is hopeful , that make it 2 out of ten.But this is not a movie.Is that the best someone can do with a great idea ( the west-east clash ) .There are important thing going on in middle east and it is just issued on the screen of a MAC * with the finger of an Amerian girl who is actually at the level of stupidity ( because she is just ignorant about the fact ) .The character are not well shaped.And the most important thing is the idea that is given with religion is somehow funny to me.At the ending scene Lana say let just be quiet and try to listen.And the background music say `` ... I will pray '' .The thing is not about religion actually.But it end up with this.How you are gon na see the truth if you just close your eye and pray.The light are already shining on the truth.Its just that nobody want to see it . p : `` My home is not a place.It is people '' The only thing that get 10 out of 10 is that sentence.But it is wasted behind this film making . As a low budget enterprise in which the filmmaker themselves are manufacturing and distributing the DVDs themselves , we perhaps should n't expect too much from Broken in disc form . And yet what 's most remarkable about this whole achievement is the fact that this release come with enough extra to shame a James Cameron DVD and a decidedly fine presentation . With regard to the latter , the only major flaw is that Broken come with a non-anamorphic transfer . Otherwise we get the film in it original 1.85:1 ratio , demonstrating no technical flaw and looking pretty much a should be expected . Indeed , given Ferrari 's hand on approach in putting this disc together you can pretty much guarantee such a fact . The same is also true of the soundtrack . Here we are offered both DD2.0 and DD5.1 mix and whilst I 'm uncertain a to which should be deemed the `` original '' , the fact that Ferrari had an involvement in both mean neither should be considered a inferior . Indeed , though the DD5.1 may offer a more atmosphere viewing experience owing to the manner in which it utilizes the score , both are equally fine and free of technical flaw . As for extra the disc is positively overwhelmed by them . Take a look at the sidebar on the right of the screen and you 'll notice numerous commentary , load of featurettes and various gallery . Indeed , given the manner in which everything ha been broken down into minute chunk rather than compiled into a lengthy documentary , there really is little to discus . The 'Anatomy of a Stunt ' featurette , for example , is exactly what it claim to be , and the same go for the rest of piece . As such we get coverage on pretty much ever aspect of Broken 's pre-production , production and post-production . And whilst it may have been preferable to find them in a more easily digestible overall 'making of ' , in this manner we do get easy access to whatever special feature we may wish to view . Of the various piece , then , it is perhaps only the commentary which need any kind of discussion . Then again , there 's also a predictable air to each of the chat track . The one involving the actor is overly jokey and doe n't take the film too seriously . Ferrari 's piece are incredibly enthusiastic about the whole thing . And the technical one are , well , extremely technical . Of course , we also get some crossover with what 's been covered elsewhere on the disc , but at only 19 minute none of these piece outstay their welcome . Indeed , all in all , a fine extra package .

Child 'Sexploitation ' is one of the most serious issue facing our world today and I feared that any film on the topic would jump straight to scene of an explicitly sexual nature in order to shock and disturb the audience . After having seen both 'Trade ' and 'Holly ' , one film moved me to want to actually see a change in international law . The other felt like a poor attempt at making me cry for five minute with emotive music and the odd suicide . I do not believe that turning this issue into a Hollywood tear jerker is a useful or necessary strategy to adopt and I must commend the make of 'Holly ' for engaging subtly but powerfully with the terrible condition these child are sadly forced to endure . 'Trade ' wavered between serious and stupid with scene involving the death of a cat coming after image that represented child being forced to commit some horrendous act . I found this unengaging and at time offensive to the cause . If I had wanted a cheap laugh I would not have signed up for a film on child trafficking . For anyone who would like to watch a powerful film that actually mean something I would suggest saving the money on the cinema ticket for the release of 'Holly ' .

I will not say much about this film , because there is not much to say , because there is not much there to talk about . The only good thing about this movie is that our favorite character from `` Atlantis : The Lost Empire '' are back . Several of the bad thing about this movie are that it ha horrible character , it ha horrible comedy , horrible animation , and James Arnold Taylor trying to copy the wonderful , one and only Michael J . Fox a Milo James Thatch . The reason for my criticism are that all the character are changed into something that they never were , and never should be , animation that ha been downgraded to the lowest extent possible , and finally , why would somebody who did wonderful voice-over work for Obi-Wan Kenobi in `` Clone Wars '' want to copy Michael J . Fox ? I happen to have an answer to this . Because they are the same person who thought he had to copy Eddie Murphy from Mulan in Mulan II . Yes , sadly , it is true . .

Whoa . In the Twin Cities , we have a station that show a `` Big Bad Movie '' Monday through Friday . Tonight 's nugget wa a film with Carrie Fisher called `` She 's Back '' about a really annoying woman who end up getting murdered when thug break into her house . Bea ( Beatrice ) come back to haunt her husband . She want him to seek revenge on her killer , hence `` she 's back '' . And she wo n't let him rest until he doe so . She irritates him endlessly ... and the viewer , too ! This movie is truly one of the worst movie I 've ever seen . Hey , I like bad movie , though ( my fave movie is Xanadu ) . I wa really shaking my head throughout the whole film , wondering who thought this would be a good idea for a movie . Bea is just so annoying . The plot is silly ; the acting is bad ; the story ... well , you get my drift . Anyway , if you wan na see a really bad movie - really really bad movie , check this one out . You wo n't be disappointed . Heh .

Although I am a fan of Heather Thomas and I have a few of her old bikini poster around here somewhere , I can honestly say that if the only movie I had ever seen her in wa `` Cyclone '' , I would never be able to guess why she had made it a far a she had in show business . Directed by Fred Olen Ray ( about a good an omen a seeing buzzard circle over head in the desert ) , this tale of a woman ( Thomas ) who must protect a high-tech motorcycle from unscrupulous type is about a `` B '' movie a it get ( or in Fred Olen 's case , `` B minus '' ) . The cast itself should tell you something . It 's not every movie that combine Thomas with actor the calibre of Beswick , Hall , Combs , Donahue , Tamblyn and Landau ( ! ! ) . If you 're lucky , very few movie do . And even though they seem to be having fun , should n't some of that fun be passed on to the audience ? I vote yes , seems they voted no . Of course , if you ever wanted to see Heather deliver an uppercut to another woman , use the `` F '' word and get hooked up to battery cable , you 've probably been looking for this one . Myself , I 'll be content with old `` Fall Guy '' rerun . One star , given in hope that when another `` Cyclone '' hit town , Heather run for shelter . I know I will .

i am surprised so few have good word for this movie . For it time ( the 80 's ) it wa a very entertaining and engaging story . Casting wa good . Story wa good . Special effect were remarkable for the time period . Deserving of an 8/10 .

Seeing this film , or rather set of film , in my early teen irrevocably changed my idea of the possibility of human interaction and the range of potential experience . This monumental exploration of individual , and their historical setting , reveals how full bodied and intense every human existence is . The people are portrayed a they are to themselves : their experience of the smallest to the largest internal and external phenomenon are detailed with the greatest of artistry and perception . Edgar Reitz display a fabulous appreciation of human motivation and longing . When these phenomenon are set against the immense time allowed by the length of the work , one can not help but apprehend the force and vivacity of happiness , defeat , lust , love , sadness , melancholy , that each person feel . When I saw these film I perceived my future experience , how my life would inevitably twist and oscillate due to both intended and accidental event . I acquired a feeling of the longevity of being and what it meant to reflect upon past life , memory and context . A masterpiece and a revelation . I only wish the BBC would screen it again . If anyone know where I can get a copy , could they contact me

At a risk of sounding slightly sacrilegious , on first viewing I 'm kind of inclined to put this right up on a par with 'Shaun of the Dead ' . Now , given I view Simon Pegg a an unquestionable comedy genius , I realise this is a rather big claim . And to what extent you agree with that last statement may be a good preliminary gauge of whether 'Fido ' will appeal to you . In a way the comedy pick up where 'Shaun ' left off , except we 're back in the original 1950s Living Dead-era stereotypical middle-American small town . The Zombie Wars are over and zombie themselves are becoming more well-adjusted , useful member of the community . This , so we 're informed at the outset , is largely thanks to the scientific advance made by the good people at Zomcom - a nice play on romantic comedy perhaps ? The beauty of the film lie in it dead-pan depiction of a respectable neighbourhood maintaining core value while making a place for zombie and the special hazard they pose . The charm and balance with which it doe this is near enough perfect . Themes you might expect from a more mainstream kitsch comedy come through - the veneer of good clean living , keeping up appearance , repressed emotion , muddled parental value , social decorum and the plight of the alienated individual . It 's a story told with happy heart and wide appeal that is brought to life vividly by the film 's all-round strong cast . It 's one of those work where it really show through that everyone involved got a kick out of taking part . It 's also fun imagining what Billy Connelly learning his script must have been like ... So in conclusion , it is probable you will appreciate the humour of this film unless your father tried to eat you .

Ugh . Even the ever-popular Diane Lane could not save this movie , and the most exciting thing about the movie wa seeing if Rourke 's face would move . One ha heard so much `` gossip '' about his botched face lift , etc. , so like an accident on the side of the road , we just had to slow down and see the wreck . The plot wa thin . Here we have a very professional mob hit man who somehow latch on to a wild and uncontrollable punk/crook , and throughout this movie we 're wondering why this guy stay with this idiot , let alone get together with the guy in the first place . Then the crime that wa not even committed ha the pro to go after the witness . He would have popped them right then and there . But then , we would not have had a movie then , would we ? And why did the realtor even agree to the extortion ? There were more hole in this flick than in my colander . The acting wa horrid , the entire movie predictable down to the minute , and even the ending . And so much could have been done to make this a much better movie . But if you have about 90 minute to kill and not have to use any brain cell in the process , then this movie is just what the doctor ordered .

If this film is examined closely , it 's a bit sad . It is detailed enough to touch upon very real problem child , who grow up in poor , dysfunctional environment . The sadness lie in the struggle and dysfunction of the mother ( Carroll ) , who can not truly help her child , not because she doe n't want to , or try , but because , it 's obvious she doe n't know how . Remember , this is a comedy , but if you 've never seen this , or if you have , watch this film and see the humanity , in the character . Good film .

I went to see this film because Joaquim de Almeida wa in it . Joaquim had a fairly small part , so it wa good that I liked the film on it 's own . In fact , I liked it a lot ! The film center around two character , Albert and Louie . Albert is a shy , retiring sort , and Louie ... well Louie is not . The story revolves around Louie 's request to Albert to let him come over to Albert 's place for just a little while . Louie ha just gotten out of prison . Albert and Louie have known each other since childhood , and of course whenver they do something together there is trouble and it 's Albert who always take the fall . The action of the film is based on the adventure that ensue from Louie 's visit . On The Run is a chronicle of mad-cap , zany , situation . However , Bruno de Almeida and scriptwriter , Joseph Minion ( After Hours ) , do n't always take you where you expect to go . There are twist and turn that add depth to this film . Of course there is plenty of outright comedy , but there is much subtle humor here a well . There are some downright good performance here a well . Albert is played delightfully by Michael Imperioli . He 's getting fairly well-knownthese day from the HBO series , The Sopranos . Louie is played by John Ventimiglia , who imbues his character with a lovable , child-like quality . ( no matter what he doe , you just got ta love Louie ! ) . Both these actor are excellent in their individual character . With Imperioli , you 'll want to hug him and bring him home to Mom . Ventimiglia , well , you wo n't know whether you should slap him or bring him home ( and NOT to Mom ! ) . < p > There are other stand-out performance a well . The character of Rita is played by Drena DeNiro ( yes , Robert 's daughter ) . The audience adored her . In talking with the others who saw the film it wa fun to discus whether it wa Albert or Louie who wa their favorite of those two . But , everyone loved Rita ! Is this film perfect ? No , I ca n't say that it is . There were many time I wished the director had had a bigger budget to work with . There were some scene that cried out for more budgetary freedom . ( Give this guy a decent budget to work with and I believe you are going to see a film that will make you stand up and notice . ) The ending sequence wa a bit of a victim of budget . Yet , budget or no budget , the ending screen shot , in my opinion , brought together the talent of actor and director into a memorable , emotionally effective scene .

`` Yes , Georgio '' is a light-hearted and enjoyable movie/comedy that contains beautiful setting and beautiful music . It 's not my favorite movie but it is a movie I have enjoyed seeing more than once . Some reviewer suggested if one wished to enjoy Pavarotti , they would likely be better served by picking up an opera DVD . Although , a full opera might be a better representation of Pavarotti 's operatic talent , oftentimes , an opera requires costume and ha story line that completely hide the appearance and nature of the person . `` Yes , Georgio '' permit Pavarotti to use his speaking voice and to exhibit a personality and character in way an opera would not . Many reviewer seemed to find the story unbelievable ; I do n't agree . Enormously talented people can be both self-centered and charming - charming enough to captivate intelligent and beautiful people . Additionally , people who are very different from one other often gain insight about themselves and grow in positive way from interacting with people who stretch them or take them in direction they might not have chosen on their own . Both Georgio and Pamela become more open to unexplored part of themselves in relationship with the other . Relax and let yourself go into a visually and aurally rewarding film with Pavarotti at the peak of his vocal ability . The ending scene from Puccini 's Turandot alone are worth the time to get there .

... but had to see just how bad it could get . The plotline wa thin to begin with , but it just kept getting worse . A female genetic engineering grad student us her research on accelerated mitosis to artificially create a male , because a biological weapon used in WW3 killed off 97 % of the worldwide male population . The surviving men are either high price gigolo in back alley club , or crazed lunatic in run down football stadium plotting to overthrow the 'Lesbian Conspiracy ' . The entire process resembled the microwaving of a large bowl of jello . Press a few button and ding you get a baby . Not only that , but he will age to mid 20 's in a month , and then begin to age normally ( how convenient ) . Eventually poor Adam get bored with the secluded cabin in the wood where his creator had raised him and steal her car to 'see the city ' . This begin 90 minute of unlikely chase , convenient plot twist , and several subplots that we never see resolved . As Adam quickly learns , what men did survive are treated a outcasts/criminals , because they are dangerous beast that can not help there genetic predisposition to violence . The propaganda machine have been in full swing , scaring woman into believing all men are rapist and murderer . This ha led to lesbianism being the norm , the fall of Christianity , female only reproduction via cloning , and oh yeah world peace among other implied result . All of which seem unlikely given that only ~30 year had elapsed since the war . Adam stumble from one bad situation to the next , all the while being genetically programmed to be non-violent and unable to really do much on his own behalf . With the FBI on his trail , madam looking for fresh meat , and his creator trying to recapture him ( for herself it seems ) , he learns that violence is not limited to the male specie after all . All in all , I would not recommend this movie . I did however enjoy Veronica Cartwrights portrayal of the 'love to hate her ' Director of the FBI , and Julie Bowen did n't do bad a Hope the 'closet hetero ' geneticist either .

The first 45 minute of Dragon Fighter are entirely acceptable and surprisingly watchable . The character are believable and interesting . The cloning lab look really high-tech . After that , it all collapse . The character start behaving idiotically , and a new subplot is introduced from nowhere about a fusion reactor ( and this is supposedly `` present day '' ) going critical , the only plot justification of which is that it is required to kill the dragon - only it doe n't . The finish is incredibly weak . One wonder what made a movie that started out so well turn so wrong . All the character except Dean Cain are played by Russians . This result in some weird situation and detail , like the character being played by Vessela Dimitrova being called `` Bailey Kent '' despite her heavy accent ( and despite her , on one occasion , inexplicably switching to * Spanish * ! ) . Because of the decent start , I considered rating this movie a 5 , but it really wa more disappointing than that , so I only give it 4 .

I 've been playing this movie incessantly this month , and I just love it . I wa around in the 60 ( oh dear ) , so it is nostalgic in one sense . However , it 's the funny premise , the snappy dialogue and the great performance that keep me watching . Dr. Winston 's reaction to Stephanie at the end of the movie are priceless . ( I 'd be more specific , but do n't want to spoil it for anyone . ) Who other than Matthau can play a man not entirely on the up-and-up and yet have u still love him ? As for Bergman 's costume , I think she look a dowdy a she 's supposed to . I think `` she wa robbed '' the one time that she appears in an evening gown . It doe n't suit her at all , which is too bad . I never liked it when I first saw it on her and I still do n't . Goldie won an Oscar for her role . People thought it wa a groundbreaking performance at the time , and yet it 's the one performance that I do n't love a much a the others . She doe have the right amount of sweetness and likability , however , which is important for this role . And I agree - I thought Rick Lenz wa great in it and it 's too bad that his movie career did n't take off after this . I hope more people watch this movie ... they 'll love it !

WOW ! ! Talk about a film that divide the audience ! This is a real love it or loath it kinda movie . Personally I really enjoyed it . I noticed that other review are comparing it to Pitch Black - this is kinda dumb a the only thing they have in common is SAND ! People can be real stupid . No , this film is far more in common with The Thing ( how people fail to notice is amazing - they even have the same basic music ) Lots of Carpenter touch are there , blue collar hero , sharp humor , endless rolling landscape full of death and thing not understood . Perhaps what stop this film being a real classic is it 's deference to other Carpenter work . Not least Dark Star which it ha something in common with . I 'd be interested to know how much it REALLY cost ? $ 8000 ? Is that even possible ? Maybe it wa based on a short film that cost $ 8000 ? But I did find myself strangely moved when the various space dude died . They are so underplayed that it 's like watching a documentary at time . Having said that the script is kinda clunky and only about half of them can act however and I 'm not sure the big guy playing the Captain is one of them . But his gun is AWESOME ! ! Give it a chance , if you like early Carpenter you might fall for it , just do n't expect 2001 .

This movie try to run away to the typical ' I 'm fighting because I 'm obliged to defend the fatherland . The NAZI 's are all bad guy , I 'm against them ' ( typical of German war movie ) . How ? By not talking too much about it , and just referring the war and the POW 's . Nevertheless I would like to see a German movie which would be something between the extremity of Come And See and the `` bad NAZI 's '' Das Boot . I say this because , excluding this factor , the German movie are the best depicting 2nd world war and the German side . You easily see some of the German hierarchical relation , very different from the one in US army . This is a movie which try to get a real sight of what wa Stalingrad , and I wa not there , and I doubt most people were there now , but if I would choose one movie depicting this battle , for sure would not be the all American Enemy At The Gates . Why do I say this ? Because even the best soldier are not hero 's , and given the condition they may regard their own life instead of the fatherland . This go for all the rank , and in the end you see von Paulus giving the example .

Homelessness ( or Houselessness a George Carlin stated ) ha been an issue for year but never a plan to help those on the street that were once considered human who did everything from going to school , work , or vote for the matter . Most people think of the homeless a just a lost cause while worrying about thing such a racism , the war on Iraq , pressuring kid to succeed , technology , the election , inflation , or worrying if they 'll be next to end up on the street . But what if you were given a bet to live on the street for a month without the luxury you once had from a home , the entertainment set , a bathroom , picture on the wall , a computer , and everything you once treasure to see what it 's like to be homeless ? That is Goddard Bolt 's lesson . Mel Brooks ( who directs ) who star a Bolt play a rich man who ha everything in the world until deciding to make a bet with a sissy rival ( Jeffery Tambor ) to see if he can live in the street for thirty day without the luxury ; if Bolt succeeds , he can do what he want with a future project of making more building . The bet 's on where Bolt is thrown on the street with a bracelet on his leg to monitor his every move where he ca n't step off the sidewalk . He 's given the nickname Pepto by a vagrant after it 's written on his forehead where Bolt meet other character including a woman by the name of Molly ( Lesley Ann Warren ) an ex-dancer who got divorce before losing her home , and her pal Sailor ( Howard Morris ) and Fumes ( Teddy Wilson ) who are already used to the street . They 're survivor . Bolt is n't . He 's not used to reaching mutual agreement like he once did when being rich where it 's fight or flight , kill or be killed . While the love connection between Molly and Bolt wa n't necessary to plot , I found `` Life Stinks '' to be one of Mel Brooks ' observant film where prior to being a comedy , it show a tender side compared to his slapstick work such a Blazing Saddles , Young Frankenstein , or Spaceballs for the matter , to show what it 's like having something valuable before losing it the next day or on the other hand making a stupid bet like all rich people do when they do n't know what to do with their money . Maybe they should give it to the homeless instead of using it like Monopoly money . Or maybe this film will inspire you to help others .

I went into this film expecting/hoping for a sleazy drive-in style slice of seventy exploitation , but what I got wa more of a bizarre pseudo western with far too much talking and not enough action . It 's clear that this film wa made on a budget ; the location are drab and poorly shot , while the acting leaf a lot to be desired also . The plot focus on a trio of robber ( a father and two son ) that steal a load of gold after killing some miner . They come across a cabin inhabited by a young girl and her stepmother ... and all this is told in flashback by the young girl , currently residing in an asylum . It 's clear that director Louis Leahman and William Sachs thought they were making something really shocking ; but despite it best effort , South of Hell Mountain is just too boring to shock the viewer . The film drone on for about eighty minute and most of it consists of boring character spouting off boring and long-winded dialogue . The only good thing I have to say about the film is with regard to the music ; which is good in place . The ending is the only other good thing about the movie ; and that 's only because it 's the last thing that happens . I would n't recommend anyone bother tracking this down ... there wa much better trash made in the seventy .

This wa one of the worst film I can remember seeing . I am sure I have seen worse , though , if that mitigates me slamming it . The humor is n't funny , there are stupid stereotype joke that , again , are n't funny . I wa a captive audience on a plane and viewed this film . It wa a complete waste of time . I enjoyed Martin in earlier film , but not this one . Same for Queen Latifah , she wa excellent in Chicago and in Set it Off she wa good too , but this role wa horrid . I mostly credit the failure to the bad writing of the script . I feel strongly you ca n't save a formulaic , unfunny script with decent actor , this movie a a case in point . Still , all involved should have been wise enough to not participate in this film . I am just amazed that something so bad can get greenlighted , made , released theatrically , and promoted .

First of all let u discus about the story . It is a copy of the movie `` Hitch '' with an added Indian Flavor to it . Salman Khan is the love guru , and Govinda is the lame guy . Now coming to artist ' performance , Salman Khan overacts throughout the movie , he try to be funny , but fails big time . You can see Salman shouting throughout the movie , no real acting is seen in his performance . Govinda pair opposite Katrina Kaif ( Oh , my god , she is one heck of a girl . A real Beauty ) is in real life a 50 year old dude , and Katrina is a girl in her early twenty . In the movie Govinda look like Grandpa of Katrina Kaif . What a pity ! Coming to Execution of the movie . This movie feel like a B-Movie , and a poor imitation of the movie Hitch . Where Hitch look like a movie with a purpose and depth , this movie is shallow and purposeless , nowhere there is justification or clarity . Just forget this movie , for it is nothing but boring , typical Bollywood fare . Actually I give 3/10 because this is the lowest I go .

I got to know ÆON back in the early 90 via television and I loved it ... What did you like about it ? The cranky drawing style ? The flawless artistic action involved ? The absurd and deadpan communication between the character ? The whole layout of the surrounding future world ? No matter what you loved about it ... The Aeon Flux film of late 2005 ha nothing of that . Karyn Kusama , the so called `` director '' of the film , wa hopelessly over-strained with transporting the original content to a new film . If you 're not familiar with the original series , you wo n't understand anything during for the first 60minutes of the film.The story is inscrutable and the vapid character do not develop during the film . Kusama 's attempt to improve the storyline by implementing some rather weak explanatory conversation between the main character is not only a lame attempt to cover up her flaw a a storyteller , it 's simply unworthy of the original ÆON concept . Charlize Theron might be an attractive woman , but she ca n't impersonate the ÆON character . Although she wa attached to string doing action scene , her lack of talent for physical motion simply ruin the action sequence in the film . The result is a tremendous amount of hectic picture cut to cover up the sheer lameness of her physique . Forget about all the rest , it 's not worth talking about ... I give 1point for Ms.Theron showing her boob and 1point for the nice architectural photography in the film . That 's it .

This off-beat horror movie seems to be getting nothing but bad review . My question is ; why ? I think this movie is pretty good . Dee Snider did very well for his first ( and only ) time directing . He also play the antagonist , Captain Howdy ( Carelton Hendriks ) . This movie seems to have a view of the future . Although it came out back in 1998 , it seems to be about modern issue . Internet predator seems to be the underlying plot here . Although taken to another level , this is an issue which we still face today . I 'll admit , the story fell short a few time , but that doe n't make this a bad movie at all . Robert Englund is even in this movie , that automatically make it better . THe acting wa n't bad , the character were pretty good a well . Hendriks wa a pretty good antagonist I think . I give this off-beat horror a 7/10 . Recommend for fan of Saw .

Armored The best part about driving an armored vehicle is that if any bum approach you at a red light asking for money , you can shoot them in the face . And while the armoured guard in this thriller are n't using their protective power to purge the drifter population , they are using their position to fleece their employer . When newcomer Ty ( Columbus Short ) land a job with an armored trunk company , he feel like he ha found his lot in life . Unfortunately , however , when he discovers that his co- worker ( Matt Dillon , Jean Reno and Laurence Fishburne ) are plotting to take the $ 42 M shipment for themselves , Ty must fortify himself  and the fund  inside the armored truck . A tedious caper with a plodding plot and phoned-in performance , Armored is an utterly forgettable film . Besides , if you really want to jack million , it 's a lot simpler to just disguise yourself a an ATM . ( Red Light )

If this film becomes a holiday tradition I am going to have to hide for Christmas for the rest of my life . How do you even think of comparing this with ' A Wonderful Life ' ! It wa absolutely awful ! The boy singing made my toe curl . And what on earth wa the deal with his hair ? ? Emmy worthy performance ? ! Please . Granted , Lucci did OK but an Emmy ? ? ? ? ? I think this film is a waste of money . The fact that they stuck so close to the original story pretending to give it a modern and retro touch made it even worse . It lacked enthusiasm and persistence on all account . Lighting , wardrobe , make-up , it seemed everybody wanted to go home . Just a big NO from me .

This movie is supposed to be taking place in and around Seattle . The , why is Porteau Cove P-R-O-V-I-N-C-I-A-L Park shown ? Provincial park are in CANADA , and not the United States . The Inspector us a Palm Pilot complete with stylus to 'read ' that someone ha hacked into the computer of the bridal shop . I did not know that this wa possible using a database storage device . A woman appears in the movie without any introduction and is never introduced . We learn half-way into the movie that this woman work in the District Attorney 's office . Then , in the correctional center a guard actually PRECEDES Jenks through a door and keep his back to the offender ! ! This would NEVER happen in a real correctional setting . The director really messed on this one -- this doe n't happen in real life . The acting is adequate . The Plot is good . The Cinematography is good . However , the many error found in the continuity lead to a 3 out of 10 vote .

I bought this adaptation because I really liked Anne Brontë 's novel when I read it some time ago and usually particularly enjoy BBC drama . But I 'm very disappointed , I never thought it would be a bad a that : the whole series made me laugh much more than moved me a the novel had . First of all , the music ( and song ) seems totally out of place in a period drama ( sound a if it 's been written for a contemporary horror film ) and like another commentator , I wa particularly annoyed by the way the camera spun and spun round the actor . I 've seen some scene filmed that way in `` North and South '' and it seemed all right there but in The Tenant , it 's definitely overdone and simply annoying . Camera movement can not make wooden acting lively . Most of the second role were difficult to distinguish at first and the script lacked clarity . None of the character were properly introduced at first . The little boy gave a very good performance , he 's very cute and the best feature of the film . SPOILERS Tara Fitzgerald 's characterisation of Helen Graham made her appear cold and harsh , letting no emotion pas through . She doe n't seem to be able to cry at all in a realistic way . I just could n't believe Markham could have fell for her and I 'm not mentioning the awful hairdo she wa given . I could not help feeling some sympathy with her husband ! Fancy being married to such a virago ... Besides , he wa the only main actor that sounded right to me . Toby Stephens I found just OK , Helen Graham 's brother not very good . Maybe it 's difficult to adapt a novel that deal with such bleak subject a alcoholism and cruelty . Besides , what is only hinted at and left to the reader 's imagination in the book is dwelt upon with complaisance in the TV adaptation : making some scene both gross and comic , ( like when Huntingdon 's eye start bleeding ) and others far too sexed up for a period drama ! I mean , do n't we get enough of those bed scene in contemporary drama ?

The gate to Hell ha opened up under Moscow . A priest , played by Vincent Gallo , go to the city to find a friend who ha gone missing in the tunnel under the city in an attempt to find the gateway . Wandering around underground he and his colleague have to deal with the tunnel inhabitant both human and demonic . Good idea with a good cast of second tier actor go nowhere much like the tunnel that are it setting . I 've watched this twice now and I still have no idea why this is suppose to be scary when not a heck of a lot happens other then people talk about the evil and we see shadow form . Nothing is clear and honestly I did n't see the point of it all other than provide a pay check for those involved ( Second billed Val Kilmer is in a couple of fleeting scene that do n't amount to much other than to allow him to be billed a in the film . ) The idea is really good , the performance are fine , the script go nowhere . Take the advice of several of the character in the film and do n't cross the river to see this .

Walter Matthau and George Burns just work so well together . The acidity of Willy with the perplexed amnesic Al is a mixture made in heaven . The scene when they meet again in Willy 's flat is a gem and the final scene round up the film to perfection . Walter Matthau give a superb performance a the irascible semi-retired comedian a only he can , the intonation in the voice and the exaggerated dramatics coupled with his general misunderstanding of what is going on form a great characterization . George Burns timing is legendary and nowhere wa it better than in this film , his calm aplomb with desert dry reply are memorable . Watch for the scene near the end when Al and his daughter ask something of the Spanish caretaker , and Al 's reaction - priceless .

Warning Spoiler . . . I have to agree with you , it wa almost there . This wa such a bad movie , about such and interesting true story . It had such promise , but the acting wa ridiculous at best . Some set were beautiful and realistic . Others are something out of a theme park . I found myself laughing a I watched , what wa suppose to be , serious scene . I really wanted to like this movie , but I could n't . The best part wa the fight between friend that ended with the `` King '' dying . I liked the Queens ' punishment . And , the final shot made a beautiful picture , though . There are so many better movie to watch . I do n't recommend this .

Brown of Harvard is a hard movie to pin down . We expect a lot more from our movie these day , so it help to remember that audience in the 20 's were a bit more innocent . William Haines is charming a the rogue who ha to stumble through pain and humiliation to find success and , even , glory . All of the relationship in the movie feel very stilted EXCEPT for the homoerotic tie between Billy and Jack Pickford , the town nerd . The movie ha everything , romance , tear , love , death , and even sport ... It 's a great education in how society ha changed in the 20th century .

I wa skimming over the list of film of Richard Burton when I came to this title that I recall vividly from when I first saw it on cable in 1982 . I remember dialogue from Tatum O'Neal that wa just amazingly bad . I remember Richard Burton 's character looking so hopelessly lost , and then remembering how his motivation did n't translate to me . In short , I remember `` Circle of Two '' because it wa so phenomenally awful . This movie came out at a time when America wa going through a rather disturbing period of fascination with unhealthy or skewed angle on teenage sexuality . Recall `` The Blue Lagoon '' ( and other Brooke Shields annoyance ) , `` Lipstick '' , `` Little Darlings '' , `` Beau Pere '' and other film that just seemed to dwell on teen having sex , particularly with adult . As a teenager during this time , I found the obsession , combined with the sexual excess of the 70 's and 80 's , made for a subconsciously unsettling environment in which to figure it all out , so to speak . `` Circle of Two '' is not execrably acted or needlessly prurient , like `` Blue Lagoon '' . In fact , it tackle the question of love between the young and the old in a brave , if totally failed , way . But honestly , it is one of those film you will * never * see if you did n't see it on it first run because it wa so truly awful . No one would want to have this garbage ever surface to be publicly distributed again .

I remember watching American Gothic when it first aired , it came into my mind recently , all I could remember wa the same guy appeared in Midnight Caller , which is Gary Cole , I do n't watch much TV , but I watched American Gothic , I purchased the Complete Series on DVD this week , & it 's still a good a ever , This is one of the best TV series ever , the reason I do n't watch much TV is because it 's just rubbish that 's on , except for Derren Brown , it 's all Reality TV or Soaps , such a Grease , Big Brother etc , i 'm fed up with it , I got the Complete Series of American Gothic for £16.97 form the Asda website , that 's the cheapest I can find it .

. . . and that is only if you like the sight of beautiful woman with nice , bouncy jug running around the so called African jungle . So no problem there for most male out there . Just to give you a sense , our heroine swing from vine to vine and climb on top animal at every chance possible for no good reason at all just to let you see her jug at all angle . Again , no complaint . The `` fight scene '' are laughable and borderline on the pornographic . Our heroine got caught by the baddie at least five time in the movie . On occasion when she ha to fight , the `` fighting '' involves rolling around in the dirt , grunting unconvincingly and basically fighting like kitten . I am surprised no hair pulling is involved . It get so bad that the chief baddie had to remind the `` combatant '' that `` I said , the one that draw first blood win ! '' in order to avoid watching anymore stupid fighting . The witch doctor Kuku wa a bloody blast . From being a big , cuddly bear in the beginning , he became manic depressive when captured and then , outright psycho . He spent the whole movie muttering line with no irrelevance . Beside Liana ( our heroine ) bouncing around topless , you also get to see plenty of other Amazonians a well a one woman who decided to jump naked into the lake to take a swim for no good reason . Yeah , it is that kind of movie . Watch the beautiful Liane in her bouncy glory . Despite the movie being more than 20 year old , the allure of watching blond woman flashing their nice jug on screen never get old .
