In one instance we should be terrified by an ear floating in the water but later we sit beside a decapitated , limbless corpse and only worry about a broken finger . A definite roller coaster of a film when it come to logic .

Super Troopers wa an instant classic . Club Dread , while disappointing to many , had it moment . Puddle Cruisers ha fewer moment . I saw this movie on the shelf of my local video store and saw at the bottom that it wa made by the Broken Lizard group who made Super Troopers , so naturally I picked it up . I only found one scene to be laugh out loud funny . A far cry from Super Troopers . All in all , I wa very disappointed . I would not recommend this to anyone , unless you have an abundance of free time , and really need to kill some time . However , you 're better off playing video game , or watching something that might make you laugh or think .

Yes , this review may contain spoiler , but you 'll thank me for it . This is the worst film I 've seen in quite some time . I came to this board expecting to see the same response I had , but inexplicably , there are several people who love this film and Spacey 's performance in particular . Some will chastise me for saying it , but I find Kevin Spacey 's acting quite limited despite the world 's admiration for him . I felt like I wa watching a meaner version of Kevin 's `` American Beauty '' role . His character in this film is ridiculously overacted , all the way down to his laughable insult he throw at his assistant . There are all-world trite and boring scene like when Spacey is tearing into Whaley about bringing him Equal instead of Sweat and Low . Somehow , I suspected this particular scene wa supposed to be funny , but by this time I wa ready to hit the stop button ( this is approximately 20 minute into the film ) . What about the faux-homage to `` Resevoir Dogs '' ? Whaley proclaims , `` I think I saw this in a movie once , '' a if he 's going to cut off Spacey 's ear . But what doe he use to cut him ? An envelope ! That 's right , he 's going to give him paper cut ! That ha to be one of Hollywood 's all-time worst scene , and the fact that the actor and director tried to carry it out with a straight face make it even more appalling . I will admit that I did n't see the end of this film ( my DVD mercifully locked up about a half hour before the end ) , but anyone who wish to say so could spare me the line that I missed a great twist and everything would have made sense . Well , I do n't care what happened in the end , because it could never make up for all that bad acting and relentlessly over-the-top dialogue . I even got the feeling that the actor themselves wanted to get out of this film a bad a I did .

Ordinarily , Anthony Mann made western with 'the big guy ' - James Stewart , Gary Cooper , Henry Fonda . . . the A list cowboy star . But in this B+ film , he tackled something notably different and had quite a bit of success with what turned out to be a truly one of a kind western . The main character , played by Victor Mature , is a trapper/ mountain man , and ordinarily they are romanticized in film - Robert Redford in Jeremiah Johnson , that sort of thing , where the hero is not in fact a typical mountain man but a clean cut heroic figure who hang out with real mountain men . Not here . For once , a true mountain man - vulgar , crude , animalistic - is the central figure , and it 's something to see , giving Mature one of his better later role . The real acting chop are provided by Robert Preston , excellent a a self-absorbed Custer type cavalry commander , and James Whitmore , the poor man 's Spencer Tracy , a another of those old timer who feel themselves trapped between ever more hostile Indians on the one side and the oncoming force of civilization on the other . Even more impressive is a very young Anne Bancroft a the officer 's wife , who is initially repulsed by the very sight of Mature 's grisly character , then find her own veneer of civilization slipping away a she begin to realize , to her own shock , that she 's attracted to him . Rarely if ever ha a remote frontier fort been so accurately realized on screen , without the romantic allure that John Ford gave such a place in his masterful Fort Apache . The battle sequence are big scale and notably violent , and particularly impressive if you seen them in widescreen format . Good show , and underrated movie , all around .

The movie 's storyline is pat and quaint . Two woman travel through the middle east and discover themselves . Unfortunately , if you are looking for a movie about the middle east and central Asia this is absolutely terrible . The producer of the film either did no research or were unbelievably lazy when filming it . To begin with , and most glaringly incorrect , the Nuristanis , a they were known in the thirty , and indeed since the 1890s and their forceful conversion by Abdul-Rahman Shah of Aghnaistan , were not nomad . In fact they have not been nomad since the Aryan invasion of central Asia over three milenia ago . Second , the city that is filmed a Tehran is not Tehran , which is understandable , however the geography of the area around the city could not be more strikingly DIFFERENT than the city of Tehran , which is surrounded on all side by a large mountain range , which predominates all of the city view . Third , Persian , despite the fact it is spoken in Iran and Afghanistan , is never heard in movie . When there are native speaker who do not speak in German they speak in Arabic . The 'Persian ' guard at the border , in fact , say to each other 'Ma hadha rujal ' ( This is not a man ) and not 'in mard nist ' a it would be in Persian . Also , the love song between the Indian princess and one of the main character is obviously in Spanish . While talking in the garden one of the main character say that the Quran us the word 'Ferdos ' and 'jehaan ' and make some reference to drug afterwords . These word certainly never appear in the Quran a they are Persian for Paradise ( indeed , Ferdos and Paradise are very distant cognate between our language ) and 'World ' respectively , though Jehaan is admittedly close to 'Jehennan ' which is hell in Arabic . When they encounter the nomad in the desert the language spoken is also Arabic , this despite the fact that there are NO native speaker of Arabic in Iran and Afghanistan and it use is primarily religious , with some use in education at that time . When they are stopped in Iran before they reach the Afghan border the people they encounter are wholly unlike any Iranian group . Their tent are typically bedouin with carpet decorating the wall and a high profile . In Iran it is also extremely uncommon for people to wear Turbans unless they are a cleric . The language spoken is clearly Arabic from the initial greeting of 'Ahlan wa Sahlan . ' When they do reach Kabul the desert they find themselves in is sandy , totally unlike the rock dirt that is found in the arid part of the Hindu Kush mountain range . There is an absence of the light green scrub that cover the ground in the summer and spring . The area is also not wholly consumed by the extreme mountain of the mountain range that won it name , The Indian Killers , because of it difficult and limiting ground . In short , the story line is the only thing in this movie that hold any water and it is still weak and common place . It lack any real draw to it , being merely the tale of two woman trying to learning about themselves a they get to Nuristan , however , even that is still-born and no real development is felt , leaving the character in the end just where they were in the beginning and nothing ha changed except that world war two ha broken loose . In short , this is a really bad movie that I would have rated at one star except for the good footage of Bedouin and the desert of the Levant , even if they are misnamed .

The Bloodsucker Leads the Dance - what a laughable title , it 's so utterly misleading . It 's not surprising that the film-makers try and mislead u though because this is one terrible movie . The story basically involves a murder mystery in a castle on a remote island . Very little happens in this film . And when something doe wake the viewer from his stupor , it invariably is unintentional comedy in the form of atrocious dialogue delivered by a hopeless group of voice-artists . These guy are so bad they make the actor they deliver voice for appear like a group of remedial-level moron . It really is hard to determine how bad the acting is when you have dubbing this abysmal . But the voice-artists can not be blamed for the script . It 's a travesty . Unintentionally funny at best , pathetic at worst . The story in general is , to say the least , uneven . The woman character are particularly idiotic ; the men are either creepy or tedious . The whole enterprise smack of pure exploitation of the audience . It doe n't remotely deliver what it promise and even when the murder ( finally ) start happening , they all occur off screen . All we get is a few half-hearted severed head shot . A few people have said that this movie is a giallo . I can not agree le with this opinion . Anyone who enjoys Italian thriller should give this movie a wide berth a there is nothing remotely thrilling about it . It 's basically a soft-core porn film with a horror angle . But it 's not very erotic either . I ca n't recommend this to anyone .

I thoroughly enjoyed this film , which in many way , a Hitchcock did on several occasion , wa a first attempt at a plot which he re-shot later in his career . Possibly the most amazing thing about it , however , is how faceless the lead character are . After watching , one remembers Murray Alper a the jovial truck driver , Vaughan Glaser 's touching turn a a blind `` patriot '' , the unforgettable traveling Freak Show and of course Otto Kruger a the suave and sophisticated villain , all of whom completely overshadow Bob Cummings a the rather wooden fugitive ( compare that bridge jump to Harrison Ford 's similar stunt in Andrew Davis ' `` The Fugitive '' ) and Priscilla Lane whose change of heart and subsequent love towards Cummings is never quite believable . The other major support player is , of course , Hitchcock himself who bookend the film with 2 extraordinary stunt . Many people criticise the older film for their lack of realistic special effect . My feeling are that with lack of technology , to even attempt and convey what the director want to show is an amazing achievement . Obviously this film carry an anti-fascist message , made at the time of the Second World War , but being a Hitchcock it is never the most important thing and the emphasis is always on the action . Well worth checking out , especially for the support role .

Man , I really wanted to like these show . I am starving for some good television and I applaud TNT for providing these `` opportunites '' . But , sadly , I am in the minority I guess when it come to the Cinematic Stephen King . As brilliant a King 's writing is , the irony is that it simply doe n't translate well to the screen , big or small . With few exception ( very few ) , the King experience can not be filmed with the same impact that the story have when read . Many people would disagree with this , but I 'm sure that in their heart of heart they have to admit that the best filmed King story is but a pale memory of the one they read . The reason is simple . The average King story take place in the mind-scape of the character in the story . He give u glimpse of their inner thought , their emotion and their sometimes fractured or unreal point of view . In short , King take the reader place where you ca n't put a Panavision camera . As an audience watching the filmed King , we 're left with le than half the information than the reader ha access to . It 's not too far a stretch to claim that One becomes a character in a King story they read , whereas One is limited to petty voyeurism of that same character when filmed . For a long a King writes , Hollywood will try shooting everything that come out of his word processor , without any regard to whether or not they should . I do n't blame the filmmaker for trying , but it take an incredible amount of talent and circumspection to pull off the elusive Stephen King adaptation that work . The task is akin to turning lead into gold , or some arcane Zen mastery . Oh well , better luck next time .

On the way back from IMC6 ( San Jose , California ) , all five ( mind you , three of u hardcore Kamal fan ) of u had reached a unanimous verdict ; VV wa solid crap and thanks to the movie we were going to have a pretty screwed up Monday . Not to mention , we swore to stay off the theatre for the next year . I wo n't blame Kamal here because he sort of dropped a hint in a recent interview with cartoonist Madan ( on Vijay TV ) . He said something like , `` Tamizh Cinema'la Photography , Editing'la namba munnera'na maadri Screenplay , Direction , Acting'la innum namba munnera'la '' ( Tamil Cinema ha grown in term of Photography and Editing , but we have hardly improved , when it come to Screenplay , Direction and Acting '' ) . While you 're watching VV , those word ring very true . Now , here are the 10 Reasons to hate this movie : 1 . Harris Jeyaraj 2 . Harris Jeyaraj 3 . Harris Jeyaraj I 'm barely holding myself from using expletive here , but fact is HJ ha mastered the fine knack of screwing up every recent movie of his ( remember 'Anniyan ' , 'Ghajini ' ) with the jarring cacophony , he bill a background music . The next time I have an eardrum transplant , he 's paying for it . 4 . Songs Neither do the song help move the movie 's narration spatially/temporally nor do they make you sit up and take notice . The film feel like it 's made of four VERY long song with a few scene thrown in between them . 5 . A Short gone too far . VV at best is fit to be a short story , not a 2 hour plus `` thriller '' . To use a cliché here , like the Energizer bunny it go on and on and on ; only in this case you do n't want it to . The later part of a movie feel like a big drag . 6 . Kamal-Jothika pairing Two ice cube rubbed together could 've produced more spark than this lead pairing . There 's no reason you would root for them to make it together . In fact every time they get together in the second half of the movie , they make a good irritant to the narration . Hate to say this , but Kamalini Mukerjhee 's 10 minute romancing doe more than what Kamal and Jothika achieve in this movie plus 'Thenali ' . 7 . Kamal Haasan 's accent Kamal ha this pretentious accent that nobody speaks either in India or in the US ; and it is n't new either . He 's been doing it since 'Thoongadae Thambi Thoongadae ' . It 's simply get on the nerve . Imagine what havoc it can cause when his flair for using this strange accent meet shooting on location in the US . He doe n't leave it at the Immigration either , he offer dos of advice to his men ( bewildered TN Cops from Keeranor , Sathoor and beyond ) in chaste Kamanglish ( `` Wha we hav here is plain bad police wok '' ) , of course with nauseating effect . 8 . Logic There are a few director whom you expect to stand up to a certain scale . Gautam fails u badly with some crappy performance in the Department of common sense . Which D.C.P in his sens would meet his love interest on the street to discus such matter a committing himself and life after ! The scene inside the theatre wa so bad , towards the climax ; we could hear people behind u loudly challenge the Hero 's IQ . `` Is he stupid , ca n't he just use his Siren or Lights ? '' ( On a busy Madras road , Kamal-the-cop-on-a-police-Jeep chase a guy on a bike just like any ordinary dude ! ) . `` Ca n't he just use his gun ? '' ( `` The guy on a bike '' start on foot and we have a fully geared Kamal in hot pursuit for a considerable amount of time ) . I 'm not voting in favour of the later , but I 'm just trying to explain the mood inside . 9 . Gore & Violence If I wanted to watch woman being raped , their throat getting slashed , more woman getting raped and thrown into the bush with excruciating authenticity , I would sit at home and rather watch a `` Police Report '' or `` Kuttram '' . The use of excessive violence should go in a way to extend the story , not overwhelm it ! Somewhere down the line Gautum seems confused about what the extension ( rape , murder ) are and what the mainstay ( story ) is ! 10 . Even a double shot Espresso could n't get the pain out of the head .

i completely agree with jamrom4 .. this wa the single most horrible movie i have ever seen .. holy crap it wa terrible .. i wa warned not to see it .. and foolishly i watched it anyway .. about 10 minute into the painful experience i completely gave up on watching the atrocity .. but sat through until the end .. just to see if i could .. well i did and now i wish i had not .. it wa disgusting .. nothing happened and the ending wa all preachy .. no movie that bad ha the right to survive .. i implore all of you to spare yourself the terror of fatty drive the bus .. if only i had heeded the same warning .. please save yourself from this movie .. i have a feeling those who rated it highly were involved in the making of the movie .. and should all be wiped off the face of the planet ..

JESSICA : A GHOST STORY is a the name implies a ghost story . The theme is meant to be horror but come across closer to comedy ! A woman come who wa brutally murdered come back from the dead . This constitutes what this movie attempt to pas off a a plot . There is really nothing more to it . The movie comprises of a series of loosely connected scene involving a guy who had an affair with this woman prior to her death . Immediately from the opening scene , this movie ha the appearance of a `` straight-to-DVD '' effort . Unlike gem such a VACANCY 2 , the movie ha no sense of direction or creativity and certainly give `` straight-to-DVD '' movie a bad name ! The direction is a poor a can be with a complete lack of suspense , scare or tension . Even the drama element are hopelessly handled and represent something more boring than even the worst soap opera you may have had the misfortune of enduring . The acting across the board is absolutely abysmal with no one actor involved managing to show even the slightest potential of a successful acting career . Many of the individual scene are incredibly long , with very long pause between dialogue exchange . I 'm not exaggerating ! The only reason I give this movie a rating of 2 rather than 1 is because some of the poor acting combined with even worse dialogue made for a few unintentional laugh . I stress the word `` few '' in that sentence . This is not overall one of the `` so-bad-it's-good '' movie like CAMP BLOOD or THE NAIL GUN MASSACRE . If you want to laugh hysterically , watch those movie . If you want to see a proper horror movie about ghost watch THE LEGEND OF HELL HOUSE , THE CHANGELING , RINGU , THE EYE ( original Korean version ) , THE GRUDGE , ONE MISSED CALL or PHONE . I advise anyone who ha had the good fortune of avoiding seeing JESSICA : A GHOST STORY to keep up the good work ! Just forget this movie exists . Do n't spare a thought for it !

I found the documentary entitled Fast , Cheap , and Out of Control to be a fairly interesting documentary . The documentary contained four `` mini '' documentary about four interesting men . Each one of these men wa extremely involved with his job , showing sheer love and enjoyment for one 's job . The sad part , I must say , would have to be the subject in which these individual worked/studied . They were interesting for about five minute , afterwards becoming boring and lasting entirely too long . The video wa filmed in a very creative way though . I very much enjoyed the film of one thing with a voice dub over another . It played out excellent and also coincided nicely with the music .

I got encouraged to watch this film because I 've heard good word of it : it wa supposed to be this thrilling true crime milestone , disturbing , shocking ... all that jazz . Well , I am disturbed because I spent money on it , and I am shocked that something so God-awful actually got released . That 's about it . This is a supposed `` new look '' at Charles Manson 's family of insane loser junky and their murder . But if this is a `` new look '' then it 's probably `` new '' a in `` fresh and totally inept '' : just watching it gave me a headache and I had to give up trying to make any sense of it or even understand just what the director intended it to be . I suppose I should say something about the plot but fact is , it wa so stupid and incoherent that I barely remember if there even WAS a plot at all . There wa something about a `` Manson tape '' delivered to a radio DJ ( or a TV producer ? ) , then an hour of pointless random footage of `` the family '' in '69 , then the Polanski murder ( looking like a bad school play ) and finally some idiotic part about a bunch of skinhead getting drunk and beating the hell out of one another in an alley ( I kid you not ) , and then it ended ( thank God ) ( Do n't ask me to make any sense of that , I 'm just recalling what I saw ! ) The performance were terrible , too . And how difficult is it to make a convincing `` Manson '' ? Get a short skinny scrawny bloke , put a dirty wig and a shaggy beard on him . There 's your Manson . But this `` Manson '' doe n't even look right . He just look like , uh , a bloke in a cheap wig and a glued on Santa beard painted black . Or maybe that 's what this film is actually about : Manson 's family did n't make any sense , so this film doe n't make any sense , either . It 's symbolic ! ( Yeah , right ) I 'm still so angry at spending money on this I stopped my normal lurking on this site and registered just to vote 1 for this film and post this warning that will hopefully prevent others from spending their money on this garbage . Stay away from it , it 's not even worth renting . PS . The recent US TV production `` Helter Skelter '' got bad review here but I saw it last month ( I saw the 1976 original too ) and let me tell you , compared to `` Manson Family '' , that new Helter Skelter is BRILLIANT and FLAWLESS . And I wa disappointed in it ! That 's how bad `` Manson Family '' is : it make a flawed and mostly disappointing TV movie look perfect .

Just two comment .... SEVEN year apart ? Hardly evidence of the film 's relentless pulling-power ! As ha been mentioned , the low-budget telemovie status of 13 GANTRY ROW is a mitigating factor in it limited appeal . Having said that however the thing is not without merit - either a entertainment or a a fright outing per se . True , the plot at it most basic is a re-working of THE AMITYVILLE HORROR - only without much horror . More a case of intrigue ! Gibney might have made a more worthwhile impression if she had played Halifax -investigating a couple of seemingly unconnected murder with the `` house '' a the main suspect . The script is better than average and the production overall of a high standard . It just fails to engage the viewer particularly at key moment . Having picked the DVD up for a mere $ 3.95 last week at my regular video store , I can not begrudge the expenditure . $ 10.95 would be an acceptable price for the film . Just do n't expect firework !

This Filmfour funded Sci-Fi movie is most definitely a must see . While it take huge influence from The Manchurian Candidate and offer nothing new or original plot wise ; it 's handled with the utmost skill that it come off a being fresh and inventive , despite it being basically a re-run of an earlier film . It 's good to know that film like this are still being made ( even if they are n't getting wide release ) , and Cypher is refreshing for that reason . The plot twist and turn , which give it an element of paranoia and also serf in keeping the audience on the edge of their seat while trying to figure out the meaning of Cypher 's mystery . The plot follows Morgan Sullivan ; a bored suburban man that decides to take a job with Digicorp that involves him listening to speech from several rival company and recording them for reason , to him , unknown . However , his job is interrupted when he meet a mysterious young lady known a Rita ... This film feature a number of stark white background that give it a very surreal edge and blend well with it 's apocalyptic imaging of the future . This give the film a very odd look that set it apart from the majority of other film of the same type , with it 's only real close affiliate being Kubrick 's A Clockwork Orange . The plot is also very efficient and ditch character development in favour of the more stylish - and more thrilling - plot developing . You never quite know where you are with the plot , which serf in making it all the more intriguing . The acting is largely good with a largely unknown cast backing up the team of star ; Jeremy Northam and Lucy Lui . Northam very much look the part of the quiet and disheartened man at the centre of the tale , and doe well with his role . Lucy Lui is an actress that ha a resume that doe n't quite fit her talent , but she ha a look about her that just fit this movie . Cypher is far from perfect a some of the sequence are illogical and at time it can be inconsistent ; but on the whole , if you want an inventive recent Sci-Fi film ; Cypher is the way to go .

Any one who ha seen Mel Gibson 's The Passion of the Christ and wa bothered by the gory violence would want to see this film instead . Though it wa n't a success in th box office or TV rating , The Fox Movie Channel still find a real good motive to show this anually . I liked the way that they trained Chris Sarandon and the men who portrayed his disciple to sing in Hebrew.Though Sarandon did n't have long hair like any other Jesus would in other film , his look are pretty close to what a Jewish man would appear . What surprised me or startled me wa the scene where Caiaphas told Jesus about Pilate `` And do n't ever forget , that you are a Jew ! '' Though that may have not been a racist remark , Colin Blakely wa trying to make Chris Sarandon look like garbage in the eye of the prominent men of those days.Keith Michell 's portrayal of Pilate wa hulking , comparing with his previous performance in `` The Story of Jacob and Joseph '' and `` The Story of David '' . But if you compare his portrayal of Pilate with Telly Savala 's or Hurd Hatfield , you can say that he really painted well the impression of a Roman procurator .

When I wa young , I wa a big fan of the Naked Gun movie but just recently I watched the show Police Sqaud ! and I think it great ! Leslie Nielson 's awesome , Alan North is cool , and who the heck is Rex Hamilton ? But anyways , it 's one goofy show . One of my favorite part of this show when they do the freeze frame scene during the end credit . I think my favorite one is when Norberg ( not O.J . ) walk in during the scene and he try to fit in with the freeze frame . Classic ! The only problem to me is the cigarette gag get very old ( when Drebin show a cigarette to someone and asks , `` Cigarette ? '' and the person reply , `` Yes . I know . '' ) I think they used it too many time by whatever . Good acting , good gag , great show ! 7/10

within about 5 minute in to the film the first fight scene i wa watching i just could help but pointout the lack of tension in the scene the camera crossing back and forth really show he had no idea what he wa doing , well actually the soundtrack show that the best . i no it a low budget film and your not going to get top 40 song but at least get music that go with the scene that is n't actually that hard acting , well if i saw any i would gladly let you know . the script wa so badly written would now surprise me one bit of the guy directing wrote this piece of beep , i will give the person one 10/10 and that wa for the DVD cover because if i actually saw `` before watching this '' in a shop and it wa like 10 15 buck i would have bought it , why well if you look at the front cover this actually well done you flip over to the back and you see that it ha actually won award . now that is a very misleading thing because even in a small film festival i would n't ever believe in my life that this would win anything all i can say is `` wow if this wa the best i would n't want to know what the crap in the film festival wa like '' film that are this bad only have one good use and that is for a aspiring film maker to use a inspiration film like this are better tool then good film , because with good film you almost know off the bat there is a good chance you wont make a film that good , but if you use a film like this you can look at all the thing they director or writer did wrong so you wont make the same mistake , and you have the added plus of looking at this film and saying if a piece of beep like this can get made then there is hope of anyone out there

I must say that I really had no idea that I wa going to sit down and watch this movie . I guess it wa the fact that I had nothing better to do between class . But , for once a TV movie caught my interest . More importantly Helen Hunt caught my eye . I really wa n't a big fan of hers prior to this film . Sure I liked Twister and As Good As It Gets . But , something about this movie really did it for me . I would now see myself a a huge fan . This movie come with high mark from ... me . Give it a chance , it wo n't let you down .

My mother worked with Dennis L. Raider for eleven year , not to mention shared an office with him . When it wa announced he wa BTK , she wa shocked . The whole day wa just her telling story about how she never would have seen him a the Wichita Killer . I 've heard her re-tell them many time . I 've inquired her about a lot of thing , and gone to all the interview that she wa asked to go to . I 've read the entire book written about Raider , Wichita is my hometown and I wa surprised that such a thing could happen in Kansas . There wa another BTK movie on TV not too long ago , and I thought this one would have been better at portraying Dennis ' killing , maybe even have some intelligent touch to his motif . I 'm going to be very blunt with the flaw in this movie . This is based on my mom 's portrayal of him , all my reading on him , and the video tape I 've seen of him talking . First of all , the camera angle were horrible . It looked a though it had been shot on a home video camera . The acting wa terrible and I could n't even bear to watch it . Dennis Raider never had long hair . Dennis Raider wa a `` very anal man '' and wa a `` follow the rule book '' kind of guy . He wa n't a nice a the movie made him look , he wa very polite and abrupt , business like . Same go for his killing , a far a we all know . If you 've seen his confession in court , you can already guess . And a for the obsession with the slaughter house ? No . Never have I read or ha Dennis Raider confessed to having a problem with animal cruelty or people squishing bug . In fact , he practiced on cat and dog for choking method . Yet through-out the whole movie he wa putting animal in his victim 's face and acting like he cared about the well-being of them . Dennis Raider never killed the people that he knew , he confessed this , but in the movie in his first killing he tell the lady he know her also . I really do n't even want to go in to this movie , and I 'm already ranting . This is NOT what you want to watch if you are interested in the actual happening of BTK . This is NOT what you want to watch if you want a good horror movie . If you want a badly shot half-porno with some slaughter scene served the side , then this is your kind of movie .

If you thought that the original from 83 wa bad then try out this modern day masterpiece . How could it be worse more you ask ? Well ... at least in the first one you had Ally Sheedy jogging in a sport bra . Other than updated graphic , modern day theme ( such a terrorist ) , modern weapon and a sexy new voice for Ripley unfortunately this is the same sad tired story . Anyone that saw the first one could see exactly where the next scene / line in the story wa going . And for anyone that did n't see the first one ... well consider yourself lucky that you only watched it once . Maybe in another 23 year Hollywood will try again .

Haunted Boat sell itself a 'The Fog ' meet 'Open Water ' . In many way this is accurate . There are scare and weird looking people to keep you interested . However the acting ability is poor at best . Showing clear sign that this is merely a bunch of friend making a horror film . Which in all credit they do to the best of their ability . When you accept the low budget make it very difficult for special effect , with the ghost looking pretty much like men with rubber mask on . Many aspect of the film are creepy and strange . But it suffers for using too many twist and turn in a short space of time which just leaf you bored and confused . In term of keeping you awake the film doe it very well . Ignoring the irrelevant twisting every 5 second near the end , you actually want to know what is going on . And are willing to wait the 1hr 35 minute for the climax . This is no Ghost Ship but it 'll definitely do for an evening in front of the T.V .

I rented this type of `` soft core '' before , but I can honestly say , I wa n't expecting this to be in the same type a `` Rod Steele : You Only Live Until You Die '' -- which wa both sexy AND funny . It had a good script , a sincere leading man , and a sense of purpose . It also ha Gabriella Hall who is hot . The reason why I did n't expect this movie , wa because the box wa missing the `` Must be 18 to Rent '' Sticker . I wa looking for more `` cheese '' and le `` cheesecake . '' First of all , I think movie should n't be allowed to start with `` actor '' rehearsing for a part at a talent agency ( or wherever `` actor '' rehearse ) . In this movie seeing the `` actor '' rehearsing highlight the lack of preparation that went into acting out the real character in the movie . Okay , having found out that this WAS a soft core movie , I did n't necessarily turn it off and demand my money back . But , the dizzying way the extended video `` erotic '' scene are added to what wa probably a late night pay-cable release are very annoying and easy to fast-forward through without the sustained quality of , say , Rod Steele . You know they must 've had some money , because I think some of it is filmed overseas . I will have to say the main actor trying NOT to spill the invisibility potion on himself is one of the most baffling acting job I 've ever seen . And , I 've seen Torgo from Manos ! It may actually have been worth the dollar rental fee ( that and Gabriella Hall ) . Still , there are better corny movie to rent with your friend .

I watched this movie based on the comment of a few that said that is wa bad but funny . But you need to be warned that this movie ha the worst special effect ever produced . They make 1950s science fiction movie look like work of art . This is funny at time , but annoying for the most part . And to compound the problem with the seriously pathetic special effect is the total lack of logic that characterized a majority of the event depicted . One of my favorite is where three of the character drop hundred of foot into a tunnel created by the arachnia and arrive to find it fully lit . Apparantely the arachnia have also managed to hook into the power grid . Very impressive . But this is just one example . And for what it worth , the music suck , the acting suck , the two cute girl are annoying , the obnoxious guy is annoying , the so-called handsome lead man is a geek , and the black girl who fall for him is a fool . Her father is the worst actor I have ever seen . I am not sure the brief moment of humor can possibly make up for the experience .

I must say : out of all modern korean martial art movie this one is worth checking out . It wa n't a epic a Musa-The Warriors and did n't develop the character a well , but it had many nice idea . Simple story : a elite soldier thought dead , return after year to end the reign of the Japanese in Korea in medieval day . His counterpart wa formerly the best friend he had and now he is out to stop him . The fight scene are all with sword or different weapon and very entertaining to watch . The motif of the figure are discovered first near to the end . You might need to watch it again to get all the connection right . And me personally ... I loved the end . I could watch it over and over again . Maybe a little pathetic , but a real freedom fighter story .... People can be killed , but not the idea they stand for ....

This is a movie that play to everyone 's emotion . We all want a second chance at thing . Jim Morris got one , followed his heart and got a chance to live his dream . What a great message and what a great delivery by this movie .

`` Zu : The warrior from magic mountain '' wa and is an impressive classic ! You never would have guessed it wa made in 1983 . Tsui Hark 's use of special effect wa very creative and inventive . ( He continued doing this in the Chinese Ghost Story trilogy and later production . ) Even now it can measure up to other movie in this genre . `` Legend of Zu '' is connected to `` Zu '' warrior from magic mountain '' ! It is not necessary to have seen this movie to understand the plot of this one . The plot is a bit hard to follow . But to be honest it doe n't matter . It is all about the action and adventure ! I always wa wondering what Tsui Hark would do if he got his hand on CGI . Now we know , he made this movie . Maybe it sometimes is too much but the overall result is so beautiful that I am not going to be critical about that . There is so much happening on the screen , you simply wo n't believe ! I think it is a big shame that this movie wa n't shown in theater here in Holland . Because this movie is screaming for screen time in cinema ! This movie easily can beat big budget Hollywood production like `` Superman Returns '' or Xmen 3 . The only thing I do have to mention is the lack of humor ! In most of Tsui Harks 's movie he combine drama , fantasy , martial art and humor . Somehow it is missing in this movie . Again I am not going to be picky about these small matter . `` Legend of Zu '' delivers on the action front with the most beautiful special effect you will see . A true classic !

One of my favorite show in the 80 's . After the first season , it started going downhill when they decided to add Jean Bruce Scott to the cast . Deborah Pratt wa wonderful and it wa fun watching her and Ernest Borgnine 's character go at it with each other . The last episode she appeared in wa one of my favorite for in the second season . Unfortunately during those day , black did not last long on television show . Some of the episode in the second season where okay but the third season it wa more about the human character than Airwolf and it wa not shown until almost at the end of the show . When it went to USA , it wa disgusting ! ! !

I picked up this movie with the intention of getting a bad zombie movie . But I had no Idea what I wa getting myself into . I started the movie and soon I had been pulled into a world of pain and visual torture . I finally know what hell is like . It 's this movie . For eternity . This movie ha no value . It did n't even really have a plot . There wa stuff going on in each scene but no overall explanation why anything happens . Instead of watching this movie I suggest that you line the nearest blender with oil and try and stuff a many bullet in it a you can . You will find that the outcome to be far more pleasant than this movie . Do n't even watch it . Not even to see how bad it is . I beg you . If you watch it , then it mean they win .

After we counted the use of the f word , oh , about 22 time in the first 10 minute or so of the film , listened to some really bad actor going on about a woman and a horse , and pretty much acting like 12 year old boy being naughty together , well , we turned it off . Relying on gratuitous profanity and potty humor is a sure sign of a loser Hollywood movie , the product of unimaginative and no-talent writer . We did give it a second chance , thinking surely it would get better . No dice . Later , my boyfriend skipped through the rest of the movie in case it improved , still no dice . The main character did have a cool bike . I would n't recommend this to anyone except maybe really immature adolescent , or frat boy .

A real head scratcher of a film by Bill Rebane who appeared to be getting worse in his trade throughout the eighty . Three crackpot millionaire invite nine people to a remote hotel to compete in a last person standing contest in which the final contestant will be given $ 1 million provided he or she make it that far . A series of lame prank are pulled on some of the guest while the others engage in what most adult would do under the circumstance namely get shatfaced at the hotel bar . Most scene are merely an excuse to focus the camera on various female body part including an opening dance number that is a crossover of American Bandstand meet geriatric aerobics complete with hooker . If there wa any hesitation that white people ca n't dance this scene hammer the final nail in that coffin . Pay close attention for the nipple slip . This continues on for about forty-five minute until Bill Rebane begin throwing dart at various plot twist and whatever he hit becomes the inspiration for the next scene making this one incoherent mess . It 's a game until it 's not a game . The three old coot are in complete control until they 're not . The hotel is possessed by a supernatural force until it becomes just prop . They 're dead until they 're not . Even the narrator at the end reply that he doe n't know what the hell happened . I defy anyone to reason where Rebane wa going on this one . The acting is dinner theater caliber minus the dinner . Most of the actor probably went back to their day job at the local Stuckey 's . I give it a few point for the scene where the yuppie broad open the closet and a skeleton is inside skull humping himself . Let 's see Gone With the Wind do that ! This Chilling Classics collection is really becoming the bane of me . Bane , Get it ! Like Rebane ! I hate myself .

this movie is not porn , it wa not meant to be porn , and unless my uncle run for president of the world it should never be considered porn . now that that issue wa sorted out , i can say i thoroughly recommend this film , a it 's issue are still widely available . it 's funny , the acting is great and it raise serious ( curious ) question . i ca n't fully understand why this film wa so mistreated , probably this is why i plan to never visit the u . Lena is the true pioneer of the modern riot-grrrl movement , confusion , curiosity and wit are her main attribute , she is occasionally angry , but are n't we all ?

Komodo vs. Cobra start a 'One Planet ' environmentalist Jerry Ryan ( Ryan McTavish ) & his girlfriend Carrie ( Renee Talbert ) hire Captain Michael Stoddard ( executive producer Michael Paré ) to take them to an island in the South Pacific , at first Stoddard is reluctant since the island is a top secret military research base but soon change his mind when a load of cash is offered . Along with TV news reporter Sandra Crescent ( Jeri Manthey ) they set sail for the island & once ashore find out that the military have been funding illegal DNA genetic experiment which have resulted in huge Komodo Dragon 's & King Cobra 's that have eaten almost every other living thing there & Stoddard & co are next on the menu ... Co-written & directed by the ever awful Jim Wynorski under his Jay Andrews pseudonym this is just plain awful , this is just plain hard to sit through & is even worse than the usual rubbish 'Creature Features ' the Sci-Fi Channel have the nerve to air if that 's possible . The script is terrible , predictable & utterly boring , some giant monster of some sort are created by scientist messing around with DNA , a group of people are trapped with said monster & have to try to escape being eaten . That 's it , that 's the whole plot of Komodo vs. Cobra , maybe this wa trying to rip-off AVP : Alien v . Predator ( 2004 ) with the title but all the 'vs . ' bit amount to is a rubbish thirty second stand-off between the two titular beast at the very end , boring a hell & surely a big disappointment to anyone hoping to have a full on monster mash . The character 's are poor , the dialogue is awful , the pace is slow , the story is predictable & cliché ridden & the whole film just suck really with a lazy script that state wrongly that both Komodo Dragon 's & Cobra 's are amphibious which they are not . Hell , Komodo vs. Cobra is n't even worth watching for any unintentional laugh since it 's so dull & hardly anything ever happens although the sight of a woman hiding behind the smallest rock on the beach from the Cobra is quite funny for the wrong reason . How doe Wynorski keep getting directing job ? He is probably consistently the worst director currently working , how can he keep getting fun sounding film set on beautiful location with half decent cast & still churn out such an awful film ? I think this wa cut to get a PG or for it 's TV showing since every time someone swears it 's masked by a Parrot squeak ! There 's zero gore or violence & the monster scene are limp , people just sort of stand there , the monster just sort of stand there too hissing or roaring & that 's about it . The CGI computer effect are terrible , this is really poor stuff that just look horrible . With a supposed budget of about $ 450,000 this look a cheap a it wa , the Hawaiian location are nice to look at but that 's about it . The acting is poor from an uninterested looking cast . Komodo vs. Cobra is an absolutely terrible Sci-Fi Channel 'Creature Feature ' from Jim Wynorski , film do n't get much worse than this .

THIS REVIEW MAY CONTAIN SPOILERS ! The Decline of Western Civilization ...... what a great title eh ? And of coarse a great movie . This is the best concert film I have ever seen . A close second being the Talking Heads movie `` Stop Making Sense '' . I first heard of this movie when Waynes World came out in 1992 . I looked at the director 's name Penelope Spheeris and thought cool name , what else ha he directed ? I thought the first name wa pronounced like envelope . After some time looking in movie guide I came across the critically acclaimed Decline and realized Penelope wa a woman ..... my Mom corrected me . I spent 8 year of my life trying to track this down . I finally saw it on VHS in Vancouver , where I currently reside . It wa worth the wait . This capture the LA punk movement very well . This is teen angst at it 's best folk . My favourite is the band the Germs who need subtitle for the lyric because Darby Crash sings so crazy , you can not understand it . I laughed when I saw this . The band Black Flag live in an abandoned church and the band X are a very intelligent bunch . Also laughed at the letter some idiot writes in to Slash Magazine about how we do not need to save the whale , there are countless mile of ocean for u to pour toxin in ! I became a huge Penelope Spheeris fan after this , and saw all her punk movies-Dudes wa OK , and Suburbia is a cult classic ! I own both of these on VHS . She is a true underground film maker and I love her stuff . I would have loved to have seen this movie in 1994 when grunge wa so popular . I wa a big Nirvana fan then , but ala I saw this in 2002 and by that point I had grown out of grunge and now I listen to Crystal Method/Fatboy Slim . Quite a change of pace , I know , but what can you do ? But if you want a true depiction of the punk movement this capture it better than anything . Much better than 1991 : The Year Punk Broke . This is a tough movie to track down , but if you get your hand on it , rent it , even if you do n't like the music it is an excellent piece of work . Now day it might be easier to find with DVD 's being so popular . By the way Penelope produced a little known Albert Brooks movie called `` Real Life '' which I also own . Very funny stuff in today reality TV craptacular ! Rent Decline ...... Highly recommended ! Thanks !

I do n't have much to say about this movie . It could have been a wonderful tour-de-force for Peter Sellers , but it is one of the most tragic misfire in movie history . That it wa Sellers final movie make it all the more painful . The terrible screenplay , direction and shockingly wooden performance all come dreadfully together to make this one of the most unwatchably awful movie ever made . I wish so much that I could find even a snicker or a chuckle buried somewhere in this pile of putrid blubber , but it 's a lifeless , humorless disaster . The truth hurt . Peter , why could n't you have stopped at BEING THERE ?

Remember the wooden , undramatic literary adaptation of the 1970s at their worst ? You will when you see this broadly acted , unintentionally hilarious piece of chocolate-box adaptation . Most culpable of all is Catherine Z-J who , while undeniably easy on the eye , substitute swishing a big dress and looking sultry for actually turning in a performance . Played po-faced like a melodrama , or Cold Comfort Farm without the joke , this effort is not helped by a scriptwriter with a tin ear for dialogue who miss entirely the novel 's sense of irony or tragedy . A shame , given the quality of the acting talent on offer - Joan Plowright , Claire Skinner , Steven Macintosh all deserve better than this .

Obviously , the comment above that fawn over the movie were made by someone who 's on the crew . I do n't recall ever seeing a movie that 's more insulting to the talented actor or the audience watching . In my 30 year of watching movie , this is the only one I have ever walked out of . Bad humor , bad joke , bad gag , bad editing , bad plot , etc . Note to producer : It 's never funny to hunt human based on race . Great that you tried to be politically correct by incorporating all race , but you 're still hunting human based on race , and that 's sickening .

best movie ever ! ! ! ! ! this movie broke my rib just by the force of laughter , but it wa well worth it . i do n't intend to do a summary of this excellent movie , just go see it if you have the chance . i think you will either love it , or hate it . that 's the quality of a real cult movie .

Oh , how we have a misfire here ; a film so bad that your mind will wonder and drift away onto other thing a it waste your time with brain numbingly poor production value ; character stereotype of the worst and racist kind since D.W. Griffith referred to the Chinese character in Broken Blossoms a 'the yellow man ' ; character so unimaginative and un-engaging that it 's difficult to watch a well a a narrative that plod along at such a slow , stupid and pointless pace that you will question the very people who say they like this film . Prizzi 's Honor is a film that end up being an absolute post-modern disaster in every which way possible . The film is a messy and senseless disaster that ha John Huston directing ; Kathleen Turner and Jack Nicholson staring and everybody else filling in the gap a either dumb stereotype or supporting character that weep on a phone now and again or bicker with a main character . Prizzi 's Honor is a film that fall into a genre of neo-noir , comedy , romance , action , gangster and overall crime  this twinned with it director and cast should be enough to propel it through some sort of a story ; some sort of a sequence of good scene ; some sort of intelligence in the form of a screenplay or something else but no  what we get is a nasty and ugly film revolving around nothing at all . I 'll give a couple of example of how shoddy this horror show of a film actually is . Firstly , the film think it 's a love story and it think this for about an hour of it time : of MY time . Charley Partanna ( Nicholson ) is an assassin who kill people for a family that he work for in New York and yet he resembles his character out of One Flew Over the Cuckoo 's Nest more than an international hit-man . He meet and fall in love with Irene Walker ( Turner ) who is another assassin and they hit it off but a the poor excuse for a plot play out , it appears all is not right . I read that the plot for this film is : `` A professional hit man and hit woman fall in love , only to discover that they have each been hired to kill the other . '' Well , yes that 's true but that actual revelation doe n't happen until about twenty minute to the end ! Nicholson play Partanna like someone with an IQ of 60 : he walk around ; seemingly making observation and talking out loud about thing he see ; he talk like he is either drunk or ha a more serious problem from within and worse of all we never get the feeling he is an assassin  one really poorly shot assassination early on ( that actually happens off screen ) is not enough to suggest this guy is a hard-bodied , best of the best , international hit-man . So with a main character who is un-likable and un-realistic , we move to the script . The first hour and a half is just a cinematic dead zone with what ever there is to suggest trace of life merely poor convention : Partanna slouch around on the phone or in person asking the same thing over and over again : `` Do I marry her ? ; Do I love her ? What is love ? What do I do ? '' and it get so repetitive , it 's not even able to act a good humour . This twinned with the way he always seemed to be on the phone to someone : a girl called Maerose Prizzi ( Huston ) played by director John 's daughter ; which served absolutely no purpose to the plot whatsoever and seemed to be there for laugh a wa the scene in which she tell her father about how she slept with Partanna and loved it  that got me thinking , wa this supposed to be funny ? Should I be laughing ? The film felt like a smart mafia picture what with it opening scene of a wedding ( alá The Godfather ) and consequential scene with a touch of noir a gangster , police men and assassin were introduced into the film . But what we get is something very , very different . The second hour revolves around some sort of a kidnap plot ; right , the love and romance is dealt with  maybe the film will kick-start . I wa so very wrong : with more character continuously talking very slowly and very deliberately in a monotone way , we have a kidnap scene involving some guy coming out of his office : this scene sum the film up . Everything is briefly planned and then executed in a heavy handed and dumb way that just make it look cheesy . We do not get to see them arrive to some dramatic music ; perhaps they have to get through security to get to the elevator ; maybe they have to be careful of civilian when they hide in their chosen place and when that random woman step out of the elevator and the gunshot occurs  the scene is n't even edited correctly . Some suspense , some drama : `` Do I shoot or do n't I ? `` ; maybe some slow motion a the character ha to quick draw before it 's too late  anything but how it wa actually executed . Prizzi 's Honor continues it monotonous and uninteresting decent into filmic oblivion a it nears it climax . It 's a film where camera reflect in window ; light reflect in side of car and 'dead ' chauffeur blink when nudged . Prizzi 's Honor is a jumbled and messy film that will try the patient of any film-goer and do n't say it wa a comedy because I did n't laugh with it  AT it is another matter . The film is repetitive , drawn out and colourless in it vision and scope for originality - there is no Honour here .

The original movie ( dated 19 ? ? ) did not show any `` monster '' , it just SUGGESTED scary `` thing '' , . This version however show every aspect of a `` sick minded ghost '' , including unnecessary special effect . The `` mystery `` , a presented in the original movie , wa the most scary part : one simply did not know what wa causing the weird thing that happened . By showing the face of the `` old man '' , this Mister ha completely disappeared . Even worse : the special effect ( cry wooden child face ) is ridiculous . This is a stupid remake , too obviously spectacular to even be close a scary a the original

`` Hero and the Terror '' is a fairly dull thriller - a la : no real character substance , predictable plot , and ... Boring . For a thriller I found this movie slow in working up to it pitiful climax , a it just seemed to drag along until Chuck 's wife 's baby is born ... and then it drag on from there until it reach the end - which I can hardly remember already even though I only saw the film 10 minute ago . I give this film 3 out of 10 - for the first 10-20 minute .

Fellowe 's drama about a couple 's marriage which is threatened by a younger third party which interest the wife of the house ( Watson ) . Wilkinson play the role very well a the troubled husband who cant control his wife 's cheating , and deal with the issue . I also like Rupert everett a lot in his role a William Bule , the man that Watson ha the affair with . Although i think Emily Watson is a great actress , i had a bit of a problem with the way her character wa written , did not make her too likable ( i know a cheater is not supposed to be likable , but some of her action and thing she did had no reasoning behind them ) . The screenplay wa perhaps the weak part of this drama , although Fellowes ' direction wa good and the performance were also quite good . This film is better than Unfaithful , but not a masterpiece by any mean . -- -IMDB Rating : 6.7 , my rating : 8/10

An angry boy who ha tragically lost his parent is looked after by his grandfather . Together they find common ground in the Gaelic folk tale which have been passed down orally from generation to generation of islander . Although tragic episode , such a the Highland clearance , feature in the story , there is a surprising amount of humour and gaiety in them . It 's all filmed in Skye , so there is a double dose of beauty . The mountain scenery is breathtaking , and it 's a rare chance to hear Scottish Gaelic spoken . I 'm English , so I had to read the subtitle , but the sound of spoken Gaelic is nonetheless wonderful . The performance are just what you would expect from carefully chosen non-actors - in other word , you are watching the real thing - people who care deeply about Gaelic folklore and history . The Gaelic community , especially on Skye , worked innumerable minor miracle to make this film . Anyone who ha the slightest interest in Gaelic , folk history , folk music , oral culture , Scotland , British history , multi-culturalism or social justice should go and see this film .

There is absolutely NO reason to waste your time with this `` film '' . The original said it all and still hold up . Either read the book or do some research about the story , and you 'll realize this remake is ludicrous . Eric Roberts a Perry Smith ? His sister could have done a better job ! Having been to Holcomb & Edgerton , KS where the story take place , the set and location looked NOTHING like Kansas . The original is riveting , from the location filming to the use of the actual participant , weapon and victim belonging . Unforgettable performance by Scott Wilson and Robert Blake . Soundtrack by Quincy Jones and cinematography by Conrad Hall ... The original is available on DVD in widescreen now . Let this turkey die a quick death .

As far a cinematography go , this film wa pretty good for the mid 50 's . There were a few time that the lighting wa way too hot but the shot were generally in frame and stayed in focus . The acting wa above average for a low budget stinker but the direction wa horrible . Several scene were dragged out way too long in an attempt at suspense and the effect were non-existent . The attack by the skull in the pond should have been completely removed from the final cut and every attempt to bring life to the skull wa obvious with stick poke and string . I also could n't help but think the budget did n't allow them to furnish the house so they kept making reference to the mover and that all the thing in storage should be coming soon . Honestly ... it would have been more entertaining if it were a worse movie . It wa n't bad enough to be a `` good-bad '' movie but wa n't good enough to be `` good '' either . Get the MST3K version ... it 's more fun .

My favourite police series of all time turn to a TV-film . Does it work ? Yes . Gee run for mayor and get shot . The Homicide `` hall of fame '' turn up . Pembleton and nearly all of the cop who ever played in this series . A lot of flashback help you who hasn´t seen the TV-series but it amuses the fan too . The last five minute solves another murder and at the very end even two of the dead cop turn up . And a short appearance from my favourite coroner Juliana Cox . This is a good film .

Ok , maybe Posse ca n't compare to other popular cowboy/western movie . But that 's because it did n't have the FUNDING those movie had . Obviously , whenever you want to produce a story such a this one , focusing on African American historical involvement ( and NO , servant and 'mammies ' are not historical involvement ) , Hollywood is n't going to be too supportive . And believe me they were n't . The producer and actor sacrificed a lot of 'out of pocket ' expense to make `` Posse '' , just so that the story could be told . I think that alone is commendable . Posse may not be Oscar material ( and they do n't like Black medium too much either ) , but it is a start . It is entertaining , and it introduces u to the black cowboy , a character most of u are unfamiliar with .

I must say that I am fairly disappointed by this `` horror '' movie . I did not get scared even once while watching it . It also is not very suspenseful either .... I wa able to guess the ending half way through the movie ... So .. what 's left ? `` The Ring '' is a trully scary movie ... I wish other movie would stop copying from it ( e.g . the trade-mark : long hair ) . Please give me some originality . Will not recommend this movie .

I truly enjoyed this film . It 's rare to find a star who can pull off the physical aspect of any sports/dance themed film convincingly and do a first rate acting job a well . In this film you find two star who rise to the occasion . Both woman deliver warm , touching and at time humorous performance . The film also touched on a number of topic , from racial issue to sexual identity . And yet the approach wa n't heavy handed . The production value were also top notch for a small budget film . I saw this at the Philadelphia Gay & Lesbian film festival and went back to see it a second time . It wa a real crowd pleaser . Everyone I spoke to seemed to enjoy this film .

Lucio Fulci made a lot of great film throughout his career and the way that many of them featured a bucket load of gore lead to him earning the title 'The Godfather of Gore ' . While Do n't Torture a Duckling wa made before Fulci became well known amongst gorehounds , and is n't all that gory ; it 's certainly a gritty and nasty little thriller , and for my money - the best film that Fulci ever made ! Do n't Torture a Duckling really is head and shoulder above a lot of the Giallo genre in term of production value and unlike many of Fulci 's later film , everything about this Giallo is great . The plot focus on a small rustic community where dead body have began turning up . The murder are even more shocking because the victim are just young boy . Shortly after the police convict an innocent man of the crime , a reporter named Andrea Martelli arrives in the village and decides to start investigating the murder on his own . Martelli soon encounter various suspect , including a sexy young lady named Patricia , a sinister priest and a local witch who enjoys making wax effigy and sticking pin into them . While this film may not feature load of gore , it doe have two of Fulci 's nastiest sequence to make up for it . The nastiest involves a woman being brutally slaughtered by a group of men in a cemetery , while the image of a man falling from a cliff and hitting any number of rock on the way down is liable to turn some stomach . Do n't Torture a Duckling feature an absolutely great Italian cast . Barbara Bouchet ( a personal favourite of mine ) is incredibly sexy in her role a Patricia , and get to flex her acting muscle more than she did in many later film . Tomas Millian is excellent a usual while the rest of the cast is well fleshed out by like of Irene Pappas , Florinda Bolkan and Marc Porel . The cinematography on display is stunning and Fulci really give the viewer the impression that he put a lot of care and effort into every scene . The story play out slowly , and it 's always interesting a Fulci never allows the film to stray too much from the central plot line . There is n't a great deal of mystery towards the identity of the murderer ; but Fulci almost manages to keep u guessing right up until the end and Do n't Torture a Duckling doe climax on a high . Overall , it 's a shame that Fulci did n't make more film like this . Do n't Torture a Duckling is his out and out best work and I insist that every Giallo fan see it !

This could have been a good biopic , but what a mess ! I had this film when I wa a theater manager . When I put the film together , and watched it , I thought I had some reel out of order . As it turned out I did n't , and if I did , nobody would have noticed . I could n't figure out what 's going on ! Everybody who walked out pretty much felt the same way !

The White Warrior is definitely one of , if not Steve Reeves weakest film . Set in 18th or 19th century Russia ( ? ? ) Steve play a cossack warrior who try to over run a mad man Russian czar by running up a mountain side with his rebel band in a goofy looking Russian white tunic ..... For the most part the great Reeves physique is hidden in a goofy , knee length tunic , with an even more sillier looking russian hat . The action is rather minimal , with only a good wrestling scene from the mid waist up that show off the great Reeves physique . This is an apparent attempt by the producer to move Reeves out of the sword and sandal genre into another historic era , with poor result . The dialogue from the script is hard to understand at various point , and only commentary from the narrator allows the viewer to understand what is really happening from scene to scene . I would image Reeves regretted making this film , but in an attempt to try and get out of his toga and sandal and tribune armor it helped launch him to other historic character such a Morgan the Pirate and the Thief of Baghdad .

If the maker of Atlantis had something to say in this film , it theme wa ( literally ) drowned out by the emphasis on `` special effect '' over characterization . Almost a if in an attempt to `` keep up '' with the rest of the summer action blockbuster , Disney ha ditched the character-driven , movie-with-a-message approach in favor of a Star Wars `` shoot-'em-up '' with stereotype hero and villain . The art is cartoony and the producer think that they can rely on computer generated image ( CGI ) of flying fish-craft and submarine to fill the gap . They are wrong , and the day of beautiful , handcrafted animation is fast flying out the window in favor of assembly-line CGI . This movie is all spectacle with no heart . At time the film come close to being a good , worthwhile movie , but frustratingly miss the mark so many time by copping out of talking about something meaningful and instead choosing to go with the glitz . Another problem with the movie is the pacing . It start confusingly and then begin to rocket along with a choppy story editing style that is not appreciated . The viewer is rushed out of the door along with Milo Thatch ( voiced well by Michael J . Fox ) and is left thinking `` Gee there must be an awful lot of stuff that 's going to happen once we get to Atlantis '' . Unfortunately , not much happens . The secret of Atlantis remains a secret with the story-tellers not really knowing how to explain the legendary island/continent . They are afraid to commit to saying where Atlantis is , even in a fictional story . Is it in the Atlantic ? Is it in the Mediterranean Sea ? Who know ? Nothing is hypothesized , even from a purely fantasy-based point of view . The viewer will leave the theatre asking themselves `` Now what wa that all about ? What wa the point of the movie ? Why could n't the surviving Atlantean 's remember how to read when many of them lived through the disaster to the `` present '' day ? And WHY did Atlantis sink ? '' and then promptly begin to forget about what they saw . There is nothing left to think about or mill over ... except the loss of money in their wallet . The character and their motivation are equally unfathomable . From the eccentric zillionaire who found the expedition with seemingly more money that existed on the entire planet in 1914 , to the ( spoiler ) collective consciousness that enters Kida and VOLUNTARILY desert it people ! ? ! The crew are a collection of quirky , 2-dimensional people of anachronistically ( for 1914 ) P.C . race and gender . The demolition expert talk like he came right out of a Warner Brothers ' Bugs Bunny short . Most of the joke are gross one-liner that are largely missed by the audience for two reason : They are delivered at lightning-speed pacing and usually mumbled . The way these supporting player do a moral turn-around near the end of the movie is hard to believe . While we applaud Disney for trying to create animated movie for adult - and this is the first Disney not to have cute , talking animal or object - it fails to make the transition . Younger child will be frightened by some of the action scene and be left in the dark by the large amount of subtitle ( when the character speak Atlantean ) . In the first five minute of the expedition , approximately 200 people are killed without a second thought . Obviously Disney think that if you did n't know who those people were , then why should you care ? Again , the movie ha no feeling on any level . Mulan and Tarzan were the last animated movie produced by Disney that were done extremely well . Sadly , Atlantis harkens back to those failed attempt in the past such a the Black Cauldron and Hunchback of Notre Dame . Disney need to get back to their root . A sequel to Peter Pan is coming out shortly but one never know what the result will be until you see it for yourself . And now that Disney ha discovered Science Fiction one hope that they will realize that that genre must have more than spectacle to it . We also hope that the upcoming `` Treasure Planet '' , a sci-fi adaptation of Robert L. Stevenson 's `` Treasure Island '' , will have more heart to it than the unfathomable `` Atlantis : The Lost Empire '' .

Bruce Almighty is the story of Bruce Nolan , an average man who feel God is messing up his life . God confronts him and show Bruce the error of his way . Of course , giving someone God 's power could take a turn for the worse . Bruce Almighty is a good comedy , Jim Carrey is good , a always Morgan Freeman is first-rate and seems right at home a God and the cast brings the plot together well . The joke are almost always on target , although sometimes they resort a bit too much on Carrey 's facial expression . I liked the fact that the movie actually portrayed God , not only that but also a a black man . I thought this quite well , especially with the brilliant Freeman . There are some hilarious scene , the opening cookie scene for instance , others miss the target slightly but still a good film . 6/7 out of 10

This film wa hard to get a hold of , and when I eventually saw it the disappointment wa overwhelming . I mean , this is one of the great story of the twentieth century : an unknown man take advantage of the unsuspecting airline industry and GETS AWAY with million in ransom without hurting anyone or bungling the attempt . With all of this built-in interest , how could anyone make such a lackluster , talk-laden flick of this true-life event . While Williams is always interesting , the screenwriter assumed that the D.B . Cooper persona wa stereotypically heroic like a movie star , s what we get is a type-without any engaging detail or insight into the mind of a person daring enough and clever enough to have pulled it off . Harrold practically steal the movie with her spunk and pure beauty , but the real letdown wa in the handling of the plot and the lame direction . Shame on this film for even existing .

I just watched this film this morning and I found it to be a great showing of the richness of faith . Babette gave them another way to look at life ; not a replacement , but an enhancement . She shared all that she had with those who gave what little they had to her . I see the story of God in here . He sent his only son to man . Man could not possibly give anything that would equal that . So , for our small sacrifice , we are given an ultimate treasure and are transformed because of it . In this film the bickering townspeople have so consumed themselves with a small interpretation of God . Babette showed them that life and God can indeed be beautiful in it 's fullest sense . The love that God 's son showed to man is the love we should show to one another and our life will be the richer for it . Even the film is a metaphor . It seems slow in the beginning , but the investment of time and attention to detail is rewarded in the end . It wa truly a feast .

with this film being directed by Roger Avery and Quentin Tarantino doing the screenplay i wa sure this wa going to be a gem . i wa wrong . i do n't hate this film but in no way do i like it . i love Roger Avery because of his amazing direction in rule of attraction and his screenplay to pulp fiction and silent hill but he made a mistake making this . do i really need to comment on Tarantino , we all know he a genius . this movie is just set around a gang robbing a bank but fails due to silly people participating in the robbery i 'm disappointed in Tarantino and Avery for doing this film but doe n't change my mind on how amazing they both are . everyone make mistake ......... 3/10 ........... j.d Seaton

Funny . Sad . Charming . These are all word that floated through my head while I wa watching this beautiful , simple film . It is rare that a movie truly move me , but `` Shall We Dance ? '' accomplished that with grace to spare . Gentle humor mixed in with occasional subtle agony made this easily one of the best experience of my movie-viewing history . It left me with a quiet sense of exultation , but with a small touch of sadness mixed in . And the dancing , oh yes , the dancing . Even if you are not a lover of the art , or ca n't put one foot in front of another , the step displayed here will take your breath away , and make you want to sign up for class a fast a you can . It wa absolutely enchanting , even the part that show Sugiyama 's ( touchingly portrayed by Koji Yakusho ) stilted step when he wa first learning to dance were lovely in a humorous , child-like way . And yet , this film wa not entirely about dancing , but more about the subtlety of human behavior and feeling . We witness a shy man learning to express his repressed feeling through dance , a beautiful dance instructor rediscovering her love for the art , and the personal growth of every member of the wonderful supporting cast . Beauty . Pain . Emotion . All the love and little agony of life are here , expressed with the delicate feeling of a fine Japanese watercolor painting combined with the emotional strength and grace of the culture .

Justin go home to live with his strict , hard-nosed police detective father , but it seems daddy ha turned the upstairs into three makeshift apartment each with bizarre tenant residing in them . Straight-laced idealist Justin is thrust into the world of the occult , murder , under-aged drinking and other dastardly thing . Ho-hum Wow , have I seen the same film that nearly all the other reviewer on here saw ? ? ? Clever , compelling , original , intense , clever , genius ? ? ? ? ! ! ? I witnessed none of those thing . What I DID see wa an uninteresting , bland , trite , extremely clichéd low-budget thriller that wa ripe with implausibility and no tension in the least bit a the killer is telegraphed a soon into the film a he give his monologue/debate/discussion . And where are these humorous laugh-out-loud moment ? I never so much a chuckled , perhaps because i wa too busy struggling not to be put to sleep by the film . My Grade : D DVD Extras : Audio commentary with director Dave Campfield ; Second commentary with various contributers a well a isolated music track ; 4 featurettes ( Making of , on the set , turning 1 room into 4 , & Inside the black circle ) ; Interviews with Felissa Rose , Desiree Gould , & Raine Brown ; Alternate scene ; blooper ; a music video for 'Addiction ' ; A trailer for this movie ; And trailer for `` Shock-o-rama '' , `` Chainsaw Sally '' , `` Skin Crawl '' , `` Sinful '' , `` Bacterium '' , `` Creature from the Hillbilly Lagoon '' , & `` Millennium Crises ''

The above line sum it up pretty good . The best asset of the comic are it 's visual gag and word-jokes ( the latter of which are almost impossible to translate , which is why the comic are at their best in their original language ) . Both are quite hard to capture in film , which is why those will never be a good a the comic . Movies are simply a different medium than comic . With that in mind , this movie doe surprisingly well in capturing the fun of the comic . The word gag are bearable , and sometimes even funny ( Debouze doe an Amelie reference ! ) . I have to mention that I watched the french version . If you do n't watch the french version or your lack of understanding of the french language limit you to the subtitle , the word joke will probably suck . The slapstick is okay a well ; it 's a very simple form of humor , and not really funny when you 're older than twelve , but it capture the spirit of the comicbooks . The other visual joke are the movie 's saving grace for the older audience , a their often quite funny . The acting is totally over the top , but again , that 's not annoying at all a it capture the spirit of the comicbooks . Only Depardieu and Clavier do n't really overact , which might be the reason some people think they did n't enjoy their role ( I did n't notice a thing ) . On the other hand Jamel Debouze and especially Claude Rich turn overacting into an artform . It 's actually fun to watch . Again , I fear it would n't be nearly a funny when the voice are dubbed . Overall not a bad movie at all , much better than the previous one . It 's not a classic and it doe n't dethrone The Twelve Tasks of Asterix a my favourite Asterix movie , but it 's still worth seeing . The french version , that is . 7/10

I would label this show a horrendous if it were n't for the fact that it 's on the same network a Arrested Development . Because it is on FOX and getting renewed while AD got cancelled . It is absolutely beyond word how atrocious this show actually is . But let me try and describe it . Take an extremely low rate Archie Bunker and have him spout out humor that would have been out of date if it were on Married with Children .
